Choose your pony, gather your pals, and complete challenges to build up your deck and help out the residents of Ponyville. This bundle also includes the Princess Pageantry expansion, the True Talents expansion, the Meeple Pack, and more! Every purchase at the price of your choice helps end childhood hunger with No Kid Hungry.

Limited Quantities Available!

mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.human_name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game CORE
mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.description_text: Canter into the My Little Pony - Adventures in Equestria, a cooperative Deck-Building Game, and take the role of a pony of Equestria! As Twilight Sparkle, Rainbow Dash, Fluttershy and more, you’ve been given a challenge to complete! You’ll need to travel amongst different locations throughout Ponyville, get new cards to improve your deck, complete tasks for resources, and overcome obstacles. Watch out - if you take too long, clouds will build up over time and cause you to suffer setbacks in your quest. The ponies will have to work together using teamwork and friendship to win the game!

mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.human_name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game: Meeple Pack #3
mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.description_text: The My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game Meeple Pack #3 features 4 printed meeples from the True Talents Expansion.

mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.human_name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game: Meeple Pack
mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.description_text: Six printed meeples featuring the characters from My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game.

nokidhungryconnection.description_text:
Donations to support No Kid Hungry are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

About No Kid Hungry

No child should go hungry in America. But millions of kids in the United States live with hunger. No Kid Hungry is working to end childhood hunger by helping launch and improve programs that give all kids the healthy food they need to thrive. This is a problem we know how to solve. No Kid Hungry is a campaign of Share Our Strength, an organization committed to ending hunger and poverty. Join us at NoKidHungry.org.

mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.human_name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game: Familiar Faces Expansion
mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.description_text: It’s time for some trouble as a new bunch of mischief makers join My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria! Take advantage of the new Discover mechanic to creatively build your deck and make the most of your traits. With new characters, cards, hurdles, and challenges, Familiar Faces adds lots of new content for your game! Featuring Spike, Discord, Starlight Glimmer, and Trixie as playable characters!

mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.human_name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game: Princess Pageantry Expansion
mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.description_text: Let’s give a royal welcome! Celestia, Luna, Cadence, and Shining Armor join the roster of playable characters in My Little Pony - Adventures in Equestria. These characters will bring new mechanics and abilities befitting of their status to the game, along with new locations and challenges to overcome.

mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.human_name: My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria Deck-Building Game: True Talents Expansion
mylittlepony_adventuresinequestriadeck-b.description_text: Come together and find your calling with the True Talents expansion for My Little Pony: Adventures in Equestria! Play as the Cutie Mark Crusaders and use the Discover ability to rally Classmates and Crusaders to your cause! With new characters, cards, hurdles, and challenges, True Talents adds lots of variety and deck-building strategies to your game!

This powerhouse collection brings together bold and not-so-subtly titled ebooks like Unfu*k Yourself and The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck alongside game-changing business classics like Never Split the Difference and Tools of Titans. 

From boosting your influence and negotiation skills to mastering decision-making, entrepreneurship, and real-world problem-solving, these ebooks deliver the strategies and mindset shifts that drive serious results. Whether you’re climbing the ladder, building something of your own, or just trying to become the best version of yourself, meaningful improvement is only a chapter away.

Pay what you want for the ultimate self-help collection and help support Room to Read with your purchase!
