  • PNG files are neatly arranged
  • Editable or add your own animation using Spriter
  • Previously tested

Included files : PNG, GIF, PSD, and Spriter (SCML)

pixelgamesoundsv1.description_text:
This SFX pack offers melodic and other sound effects inspired by the sounds of retro chipsound devices producing standard waveforms (square, triangle, etc.), along with sounds containing sonic artifacts from low-bit rate and down-sampled audio. Ideal for pixel-art, arcade, low-poly, and retro-style games, including Fighting, Arcade, Puzzle, and Metroidvania.

All sounds in the pack were re-rendered in 96kHz 24-bit and 44.1kHz 16-bit formats for development compatibility.

animeweaponsoundeffectspack.description_text:
Bring your game to life with 681 high-quality anime weapon sound effects, carefully designed for easy implementation in any project. Whether you're crafting an anime RPG, action-packed hack-and-slash, or futuristic mecha shooter, this sound pack delivers everything you need to create satisfying and immersive combat audio.

Each weapon type comes with game-ready, clearly named files, making it simple to drop them into your project and features variations from light to heavy, critical, and epic, giving you full control over intensity and impact:

Swords & Spears – Swings, swooshes, impact hits, and special skills

Bows – String draw, arrow release, and impact sounds

Lasers & Mecha – Power-up charges, shots, impacts, and skill effects

Guns – Designed anime-style gunshots with skill variations

superpixelfantasyfxpack3.description_text:
⭐ SUPER PIXEL FANTASY FX PACK 3 ⭐

This asset pack includes 10 pixel art effect types. Each effect type comes in a large and a small size, and all effects have multiple color themes! With a wide variety of fluid, high-quality animations, these effects are sure to juice up your game!

timeelementscharacterexpansionpack1.description_text:
The first Time Elements Character Expansion pack has over 50 new modular pieces, so you can create more characters than you will need to fill an entire game world!

Features:

  • Fully compatible with the pieces from the Elements Core Set
  • Over 50 unique pieces that can create hundreds of characters
  • Animations in all four directions: walk, attack, crouch, jump, and others
  • Build your own sprites with the updated Character Generator!
  • Includes 5 premade heroes and premade cultist NPC sprites in multiple colors

hexvolcanicwastesterrain.description_text:
Simple yet evocative hand-painted hex tiles of volcanic terrain. Use these hex tiles to enliven your game overworld, strategy map, boardgame-like visuals, or RPG campaign! (I'm sure you're already erupting with ideas.)

painted at 256x384 pixels so that mountains can overlap the tiles behind

hexes are transparent-background PNG files

includes 42 decor overlay sprites (rocks, trees, mini volcanic cones, fumaroles)

swordcreatormegapack.description_text:
Craft thousands of unique swords

Perfect for dungeon crawlers, rogue likes with huge inventories, weapon levels and even swapping out character weapons.

Combine hundreds of fully editable sword pieces to craft your perfect weapon.

epicfantasyrpguikit_ultimategameinterfac.human_name: Epic Fantasy RPG UI Kit - Ultimate Game Interface Assets
epicfantasyrpguikit_ultimategameinterfac.description_text:
Elevate Your Fantasy RPG Game with Our Legendary UI Kit!

Unleash the magic your game through this Fantasy RPG GUI Asset Pack, designed to transport your players to a realm of wonder and awe. This comprehensive UI kit is packed with an epic collection of:

- Stunning Interface Elements: Buttons, menus, windows, and more, carefully designed to captivate and engage.

- Customizable Assets: Easily adapt our assets to fit your game's unique style and branding.

- High-Quality Graphics: Detailed, crisp, and vibrant visuals that will make your game shine.

Transform your game's interface into a work of art with our Fantasy RPG GUI Asset Pack. Perfect for game developers, designers, and artists seeking to create an immersive and enchanting experience. Get ready to delight your players and leave a lasting impression!

noiremusicbundle.description_text:
Inspired by the soundscapes of L.A. Noir, Grim Fandango, and others, this music pack contains over 100 original tracks fit for games with a film-noir aesthetic.

***All Tracks Are YOUTUBE SAFE***

AUTHENTIC TO THE ERA

Each track was composed and produced using top industry-standard software and hardware found in major studios from around the world, with some featuring professional musicians. You'll get an authentic sound that will capitalize on your game’s artistic aesthetic.

superpixelprojectilespack3.description_text:
⭐ SUPER PIXEL PROJECTILES PACK 3 ⭐

This asset pack includes 10 pixel art projectile types, mainly fantasy-themed. Each projectile comes in a large and a small size, and all projectiles have multiple color themes! With a wide variety of fluid, high-quality animations, these projectiles are sure to juice up your game!

japancollection_charactersvol1.description_text:
Populate your project with unique characters, create memorable interactions, and deadly battles.

This asset pack comes with 8 unique pixel-art front facing character illustrations and variations for 5 of them. Add a piece of Japan to your project with these characters, crafted for ""The Japan Collection"" by Lux!

hexcoldlandsterrain.description_text:
Cold and snow-covered lands lovingly digitally-painted as 2D terrain hex tiles suitable for an overworld, a strategy game map, boardgame-like visuals, or making maps for your own RPG campaign!

13 tile types x 4 variations + 20 additional location tiles = 72 tiles total painted at 256x384 pixels so that trees, hills, and mountains can overlap the tiles behind includes 40 transparent-background non-tile terrain decoration sprites that can be overlaid anywhere

sci-fisoundz.description_text:
**Various futuristic and modern sounds for the contemporary games**

This sound pack features a diverse collection of sci-fi sounds, including looping futuristic ambiences, guns, laser guns, machine guns, UI sounds, glitches, alien creatures, beeps, impacts or hits, sirens or alarms, risers and drops, explosions, sparks, buzzes, flamethrowers, aircraft-related sounds, transformational sounds, bells, and many other crazy experimental sounds.

Please check the sounds demo where we have included at least one sound from each sound type for your reference to check the sounds and their quality aspect.

icons_craftingtoolsforagingandherbalism.description_text:
Human-made digitally-painted and richly-detailed icons suitable for a strategy game, RPG, or boardgame-like experience.

This is a varied set of premodern crafting tools, crafted products, and natural products like herbs, berries, mushrooms, hides, feathers, furs, ashes, oil, and bones. These would easily fit into an RPG with survival/crafting elements.

117 icons (so far! more are added with updates)

all icons are 128x128 pixels

icons work on black, white, or transparent background

includes raw materials: animal, vegetable, mineral, and fungal

includes various hand-tools, intermediate crafting products, and some finished goods

gunmakingmegapack.description_text: Make hundreds of gun types for your characters by easily piecing together gun parts included in this gun creator pack. Create different style game weapons from comedy guns to realistic guns.

japancollection_backgroundsvol2.description_text:
Night-mode.

The second volume of my animated pixel-art illustrations. This volume focuses on the twilight hours in Japan, giving ambience of the deep night into dreamlike (and sometimes surrealistic) early hours.

Perfect for use in Visual Novel making programs, for the title screen/cut scenes in your project, or for the background of a Streamer or VTuber channel. These illustrations capture the essence of suburban to rural Japan during the night.

This pack contains:

- 10 animated and static retro pixel-art illustrations with a night time theme at the following resolutions:

4000x4000

2000x2000

1920x1080

1280x720

- File formats include PNG, GIF, MP4.

- Battleback crops of the illustrations for use in RPGMaker VXAce and RPGMaker MV/MZ.

gui_neon2.description_text:
Key Features

The 16-BIT Collection package has everything you need to create a 2D game in a nostalgic 16-bit pixel-art style, spanning genres such as fantasy, sci-fi, adventure, action, top-down and RPG

The first TIME ELEMENTS tileset pack is here -- begin your adventure!

These packs can be used for games such as: Military, FPS, RTS, Survival, Shooter, MOBA, Sci-Fi, Action-Adventure, Apocalyptic, Horror, simulation, Sandbox, RPG and more.

They're also perfect for animations, trailers, YouTube videos, and all other audio / visual productions.

littlekidsrock.description_text:
Donations to support Musci Will are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Music Will runs the largest nonprofit music program in the US public school system. Our teachers currently serve over 500,000 students in more than 600 cities and towns across the country.

We believe that music education is a right, not a privilege, and it should reflect the cultures of the students it serves.

That’s why, for two decades now, our programs have taught students such popular American genres as rock, pop, R&B, Latin, rap and country—alongside styles already taught in schools, such as classical and jazz.

Today, a national network of K-12 districts has adopted the Music Will program as their own.

More than 70 colleges and universities now teach our approach to their music education majors. Several state departments of education have partnered with Music Will to grow music education in the schools they serve.

Our mission of transforming lives by transforming music education has grown into a movement.

microsoftdefenderforidentityindepth.human_name: Microsoft Defender for Identity in Depth
microsoftdefenderforidentityindepth.description_text:
Key Features

  • Optimize configurations for peak security performance by tailoring detection thresholds
  • Leverage real-world insights and case studies to improve threat detection and response strategies
  • Establish a strong ITDR defense with Microsoft Defender for Identity
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

If you’re an IT or security professional looking to enhance your cybersecurity skills, especially in identity protection and threat management with Microsoft Defender for Identity (MDI), then this book is for you. It's perfect for system administrators, cybersecurity analysts, and cloud engineers who want to strengthen their expertise in MDI. A basic understanding of cybersecurity principles, as well as familiarity with Microsoft environments and Active Directory are recommended prerequisites for maximizing your learning experience.

ghidrasoftwarereverse-engineeringforbegi.description_text:
Key Features

  • Make the most of Ghidra on different platforms such as Linux, Windows, and macOS
  • Unlock the potential of plug-ins and extensions for disassembly, assembly, decompilation, and scripting
  • Learn advanced concepts like binary diffing, debugging, unpacking real-world malware samples, and reverse engineering ransomware
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for software engineers, security researchers, and professionals working in software development and testing who want to deepen their expertise in reverse engineering and cybersecurity. Aspiring malware analysts and vulnerability researchers will also benefit greatly. Prior experience with Java or Python and a foundational understanding of programming is recommended.

awscertifiedsecurity_specialtyscs-c02exa.human_name: AWS Certified Security - Specialty (SCS-C02) Exam Guide
awscertifiedsecurity_specialtyscs-c02exa.description_text:
Key Features:

  • Stay updated with the most current SCS-C02 exam syllabus</li><li>Gain modern cloud security skills to build robust security solutions
  • Access online exam prep resources like mock exams, flashcards, and exam tips to help with preparation
  • Purchase of this book unlocks access to web-based exam prep resources such as mock exams and flashcards

Who this book is for:

This book is for system administrators or security professionals looking to gain AWS security certification. Prior experience in securing cloud environments is necessary to get the most out of this book.

practicalcybersecurityarchitecture.description_text:
Key Features

  • Leverage practical use cases to successfully architect complex security structures
  • Learn risk assessment methodologies for the cloud, networks, and connected devices
  • Understand cybersecurity architecture to implement effective solutions in medium-to-large enterprises

Who this book is for

If you are involved in the process of implementing, planning, operating, or maintaining cybersecurity in an organization, then this security book is for you. This includes security practitioners, technology governance practitioners, systems auditors, and software developers invested in keeping their organizations secure. If you’re new to cybersecurity architecture, the book takes you through the process step by step; for those who already work in the field and have some experience, the book presents strategies and techniques that will help them develop their skills further.

effectivethreatinvestigationforsocanalys.human_name: Effective Threat Investigation for SOC Analysts
effectivethreatinvestigationforsocanalys.description_text:
Key Features

  • Understand and analyze various modern cyber threats and attackers' techniques
  • Gain in-depth knowledge of email security, Windows, firewall, proxy, WAF, and security solution logs
  • Explore popular cyber threat intelligence platforms to investigate suspicious artifacts

Who this book is for

This book is for Security Operation Center (SOC) analysts, security professionals, cybersecurity incident investigators, incident handlers, incident responders, or anyone looking to explore attacker techniques and delve deeper into detecting and investigating attacks. If you want to efficiently detect and investigate cyberattacks by analyzing logs generated from different log sources, then this is the book for you. Basic knowledge of cybersecurity and networking domains and entry-level security concepts are necessary to get the most out of this book.

enhancingyourcloudsecuritywithacnappsolu.human_name: Enhancing Your Cloud Security with a CNAPP Solution
enhancingyourcloudsecuritywithacnappsolu.description_text:
Key Features

  • Master the CNAPP lifecycle from planning to operationalization using real-world practical scenarios.
  • Dive deep into the features of Microsoft's Defender for Cloud to elevate your organization’s security posture.
  • Explore hands-on examples and implementation techniques from a leading expert in the cybersecurity industry

Who this book is for

This book is aimed at Cloud Security Professionals that work with Cloud Security, Posture Management, or Workload Protection. DevOps Engineers that need to have a better understanding of Cloud Security Tools and SOC Analysts that need to understand how CNAPP can enhance their threat hunting capabilities can also benefit from this book. Basic knowledge of Cloud Computing, including Cloud Providers such as Azure, AWS, and GCP is assumed.

osinthandbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Familiarize yourself with the best open-source intelligence tools such as Maltego, Shodan, and Aircrack-ng
  • Develop an OSINT-driven threat intelligence program to mitigate cyber risks
  • Leverage the power of information through OSINT with real-world case studies
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for ethical hackers and security professionals who want to expand their cybersecurity toolbox and stay one step ahead of online threats by gaining comprehensive insights into OSINT tools and techniques. Basic knowledge of cybersecurity concepts is required.

zerotrustoverviewandplaybookintroduction.human_name: Zero Trust Overview and Playbook Introduction
zerotrustoverviewandplaybookintroduction.description_text:
Key Features

  • Get simple, clear, and practical advice for everyone from CEOs to security operations
  • Organize your Zero Trust journey into role-by-role execution stages
  • Integrate real-world implementation experience with global Zero Trust standards
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free eBook in the PDF format

Who this book is for

Whether you’re a business leader, security practitioner, or technology executive, this comprehensive guide to Zero Trust has something for you. This book provides practical guidance for implementing and managing a Zero Trust strategy and its impact on every role (including yours!). This is the go-to guide for everyone including board members, CEOs, CIOs, CISOs, architects, engineers, IT admins, security analysts, program managers, product owners, developers, and managers. Don't miss out on this essential resource for securing your organization against cyber threats.

adversarialaiattacksmitigationsanddefens.human_name: Adversarial AI Attacks, Mitigations, and Defense Strategies
adversarialaiattacksmitigationsanddefens.description_text:
Key Features

  • Understand the unique security challenges presented by predictive and generative AI
  • Explore common adversarial attack strategies as well as emerging threats such as prompt injection
  • Mitigate the risks of attack on your AI system with threat modeling and secure-by-design methods
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book tackles AI security from both angles - offense and defence. AI developers and engineers will learn how to create secure systems, while cybersecurity professionals, such as security architects, analysts, engineers, ethical hackers, penetration testers, and incident responders will discover methods to combat threats to AI and mitigate the risks posed by attackers. The book also provides a secure-by-design approach for leaders to build AI with security in mind.

To get the most out of this book, you’ll need a basic understanding of security, ML concepts, and Python.

incidentresponseforwindows.description_text:
Key Features

  • Explore contemporary sophisticated cyber threats, focusing on their tactics, techniques, and procedures
  • Craft the most robust enterprise-wide cybersecurity incident response methodology, scalable to any magnitude
  • Master the development of efficient incident remediation and prevention strategies
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for IT professionals, Windows IT administrators, cybersecurity practitioners, and incident response teams, including SOC teams, responsible for managing cybersecurity incidents in Windows-based environments. Specifically, system administrators, security analysts, and network engineers tasked with maintaining the security of Windows systems and networks will find this book indispensable. Basic understanding of Windows systems and cybersecurity concepts is needed to grasp the concepts in this book.

developers.developer-name: Anatoly Tykushin, Svetlana Ostrovskaya, Dmitry Volkov

hackthecybersecurityinterview.description_text:
Key Features

  • Get well-versed with the interview process for cybersecurity job roles
  • Prepare for SOC analyst, penetration tester, malware analyst, digital forensics analyst, CISO, and more roles
  • Understand different key areas in each role and prepare for them

Who this book is for

This cybersecurity book is for college students, aspiring cybersecurity professionals, computer and software engineers, and anyone looking to prepare for a job interview for any cybersecurity role. The book is also for experienced cybersecurity professionals who want to improve their technical and behavioral interview skills. Recruitment managers can also use this book to conduct interviews and tests.

pentestingactivedirectoryandwindows-base.human_name: Pentesting Active Directory and Windows-based Infrastructure

Warning: This course intentionally includes a virus file as part of the learning material since the course deals with security issues.

Key Features

  • Find out how to attack real-life Microsoft infrastructure
  • Discover how to detect adversary activities and remediate your environment
  • Apply the knowledge you’ve gained by working on hands-on exercises

Who this book is for

This book is for pentesters and red teamers, security and IT engineers, as well as blue teamers and incident responders interested in Windows infrastructure security. The book is packed with practical examples, tooling, and attack-defense guidelines to help you assess and improve the security of your real-life environments. To get the most out of this book, you should have basic knowledge of Windows services and Active Directory.

pythonforsecurityandnetworking.description_text:
Warning: This course intentionally includes a virus file as part of the learning material since the course deals with security issues.

Key Features

  • Discover security techniques to protect your network and systems using Python
  • Create scripts in Python to automate security and pentesting tasks
  • Analyze traffic in a network and extract information using Python

Who this book is for

This Python book is for network engineers, system administrators, and other security professionals looking to overcome common networking and security issues using Python. You will also find this book useful if you're an experienced programmer looking to explore Python’s full range of capabilities. A basic understanding of general programming structures as well as familiarity with the Python programming language is a prerequisite.

cisa_certifiedinformationsystemsauditors.human_name: CISA - Certified Information Systems Auditor Study Guide
cisa_certifiedinformationsystemsauditors.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn from a qualified CISA and bestselling instructor, Hemang Doshi
  • Aligned with the latest CISA exam objectives from the 28th edition of the Official Review Manual
  • Assess your exam readiness with over 1000 targeted practice test questions

Who this book is for

This CISA study guide is for anyone with a non-technical background aspiring to achieve the CISA certification. It caters to those currently working in or seeking employment in IT audit and security management roles.

developers.developer-name: Hemang Doshi, Javen Khoo Ai Wee

masteringmicrosoft365defender.description_text:
Key Features

  • Help in understanding Microsoft 365 Defender and how it is crucial for security operations
  • Implementation of the proactive security defense capabilities of Microsoft Defender for Endpoint, Identity, Office 365, and Cloud Apps so that attacks can be stopped before they start
  • A guide to hunting and responding to threats using M365D’s extended detection and response capabilities

Who this book is for

You’re a security engineer, incident responder, blue teamer, or an IT security professional who wants to deploy and manage Microsoft 365 Defender services and successfully investigate and respond tocyber threats

You have a basic understanding of networking, vulnerabilities, operating systems, email, Active Directory, and cloud apps

developers.developer-name: Ru Campbell, Viktor Hedberg, Heike Ritter

cryptographyalgorithms.description_text:
Key Features

  • Explore the basic principles and history of cryptography
  • Identify key vulnerabilities and evaluate how cryptographic algorithms defend against attacks
  • Become a forward-thinking cryptographer by learning the new protocols in zero knowledge, homomorphic encryption and quantum cryptography

Who this book is for

This book is for beginners who are IT professionals, students, cybersecurity enthusiasts, and anyone who wants to develop skills in modern cryptography and build a successful cybersecurity career. The book systematically addresses mathematical issues related to the algorithms that may arise. However, a prior knowledge of university-level mathematics, algebra, its main operators, modular mathematics, and finite fields theory is required. Some knowledge of elliptic curves and quantum computing, especially matrices and plotting curves would also be beneficial to get the most out of this book.

automatingsecuritydetectionengineering.description_text:
Key Features

  • Create automated CI/CD pipelines for testing and implementing threat detection use cases
  • Apply implementation strategies to optimize the adoption of automated work streams
  • Use a variety of enterprise-grade tools and APIs to bolster your detection program
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for security engineers and analysts responsible for the day-to-day tasks of developing and implementing new detections at scale. If you’re working with existing programs focused on threat detection, you’ll also find this book helpful. Prior knowledge of DevSecOps, hands-on experience with any programming or scripting languages, and familiarity with common security practices and tools are recommended for an optimal learning experience.

worldcentralkitchen.description_text:
Donations to support World Central Kitchen are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

World Central Kitchen (WCK) is a non-profit organization addressing food insecurity during and after natural disasters and humanitarian crises, while also operating long-term programs aimed at improving livelihoods by strengthening local food ecosystems. Founded in 2010 by Chef Jose Andres following the devastating earthquake in Haiti, WCK has since served more than 8 million meals to those affected by disasters.

powershellautomationandscriptingforcyber.human_name: PowerShell Automation and Scripting for Cybersecurity
powershellautomationandscriptingforcyber.description_text:
Warning: This course intentionally includes a virus file as part of the learning material since the course deals with security issues.

Key Features

  • Master PowerShell for security by configuring, auditing, monitoring, exploiting, and bypassing defenses
  • Research and develop methods to bypass security features and use stealthy tradecraft
  • Explore essential security features in PowerShell and protect your environment against exploits and bypasses

Who this book is for

This book is for security professionals, penetration testers, system administrators, and red and blue teams looking to learn how to leverage PowerShell for security operations. A basic understanding of PowerShell, cybersecurity fundamentals, and scripting is a must. For some parts a basic understanding of active directory, C++/C#, and assembly can be beneficial.

ultimatekalilinuxbook.description_text:
Key Features

  • Learn to think like an adversary to strengthen your cyber defences
  • Execute sophisticated real-life penetration tests, uncovering vulnerabilities in enterprise networks that go beyond the surface level
  • Securely manipulate environments using Kali Linux, ensuring you're fully equipped to safeguard your systems against real-world threats

Who this book is for

This pentesting book is for students, trainers, cybersecurity professionals, cyber enthusiasts, network security professionals, ethical hackers, penetration testers, and security engineers. If you do not have any prior knowledge and are looking to become an expert in penetration testing using the Kali Linux, then this book is for you.

securitymonitoringwithwazuh.description_text:
Key Features

  • Get a thorough overview of Wazuh’s features and learn how to make the most of them
  • Detect network and host-based intrusion, monitor for known vulnerabilities and exploits, and detect anomalous behavior
  • Build a monitoring system for security compliance that adheres to frameworks such as MITRE ATT&CK, PCI DSS, and GDPR
  • Purchase of the print or Kindle book includes a free PDF eBook

Who this book is for

This book is for SOC analysts, security architects, and security engineers who want to set up open-source SOC with critical capabilities such as file integrity monitoring, security monitoring, threat intelligence automation, and cloud security monitoring. Managed service providers aiming to build a scalable security monitoring system for their clients will also find valuable insights in this book. Familiarity with basic IT, cybersecurity, cloud, and Linux concepts is necessary to get started.

resilientcybersecurity.description_text:
Key Features

  • Gain a deep understanding of the current state of cybersecurity, including insights into the latest threats such as Ransomware and AI
  • Lay the foundation of your cybersecurity program with a comprehensive approach allowing for continuous maturity
  • Equip yourself with the strategies needed to build and manage an effective cybersecurity program

Who this book is for

This book is geared towards the top leaders within an organization, C-level, CISO/CSO, directors, and program managers who build the strategy and execute the program. Cybersecurity managers, architects, engineers, administrators, analysts, and project managers who work in Cybersecurity would also benefit from this book. In addition, those who are still determining what they would like to do within cybersecurity can also benefit from this book by gaining an understanding of everything involved within a cybersecurity program. Basic knowledge of cybersecurity and its concepts will be helpful.

worldcentralkitchen.description_text:
Donations to support World Central Kitchen are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

World Central Kitchen (WCK) is a non-profit organization addressing food insecurity during and after natural disasters and humanitarian crises, while also operating long-term programs aimed at improving livelihoods by strengthening local food ecosystems. Founded in 2010 by Chef Jose Andres following the devastating earthquake in Haiti, WCK has since served more than 8 million meals to those affected by disasters.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Ultimate Cybersecurity Career by Packt
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get The Ultimate Kali Linux Book, Practical Cybersecurity Architecture, Automating Security Detection Engineering, Enhancing Your Cloud Security with a CNAPP Solution, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Learn the skills and knowledge you need to build the foundation for a new career in cybersecurity—the pros at Packt are giving you the expert insights you need to succeed in a variety of cybersecurity subsectors. Gain insights from courses like Automating Security Detection Engineering, AWS Certified Security, Pentesting Active Directory and Windows-based Infrastructure, and more. Deepen your understanding whether you’re a novice or a seasoned professional, and help support World Central Kitchen with your purchase!
from_bundle.author: Packt

basic_data.human_name: Humble Tech Book Bundle: Software Strategy and Risk Management by Pragmatic Programmers
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Even the most efficient, streamlined, and well-ordered teams hit a snag once in a while. Whether it’s software issues, gaps in work structuring, or any number of other things, this bundle of workplace strategy resources from The Pragmatic Programmers is here to help you find a solution to every problem you encounter. In this bundle of 19 ebooks you’ll find breakdowns of the Kanban board method, instructions on running experiments with A/B testing that’ll get you real results, advice on how to use free and open source software, tons of strategies for building an accomplished, motivated team, and more! Build the kind of team that works for everyone and get stuff done—and support Save the Children with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Solutions for every problem. Even the most efficient, streamlined, and well-ordered teams hit a snag once in a while. Whether it’s software issues, gaps in work structuring, or any number of other things, this bundle of workplace strategy resources from The Pragmatic Programmers is here to help you find a solution to every problem you encounter. In this bundle of 19 ebooks you’ll find breakdowns of the Kanban board method, instructions on running experiments with A/B testing that’ll get you real results, advice on how to use free and open source software, tons of strategies for building an accomplished, motivated team, and more! Build the kind of team that works for everyone and get stuff done—and support Save the Children with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $749. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF and ePub formats, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Save the Children. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

programmanagementforopensourceprojects.human_name: Program Management for Open Source Projects
programmanagementforopensourceprojects.description_text: Every organization develops a bureaucracy, and open source projects are no exception. When your structure is intentional and serves the project, it can lead to a successful and predictable conclusion. But project management alone won’t get you there. Take the next step to full program management. Become an expert at facilitating communication between teams, managing schedules and project lifecycle, coordinating a process for changes, and keeping meetings productive. Make decisions that get buy-in from all concerned. Learn how to guide your community-driven open source project with just the right amount of structure.

next-levelaandbtesting.description_text: The better the tools you have in your experimentation toolkit, the better off teams will be shipping and evaluating new features on a product. Learn how to create robust A/B testing strategies that evolve with your product and engineering needs. See how to run experiments quickly, efficiently, and at less cost with the overarching goal of improving your product experience and your company’s bottom line.

creatingsoftwarewithmoderndiagrammingtec.human_name: Creating Software with Modern Diagramming Techniques
creatingsoftwarewithmoderndiagrammingtec.description_text: Diagrams communicate relationships more directly and clearly than words ever can. Using only text-based markup, create meaningful and attractive diagrams to document your domain, visualize user flows, reveal system architecture at any desired level, or refactor your code. With the tools and techniques this book will give you, you’ll create a wide variety of diagrams in minutes, share them with others, and revise and update them immediately on the basis of feedback. Adding diagrams to your professional vocabulary will enable you to work through your ideas quickly when working on your own code or discussing a proposal with colleagues.

agileretrospectivessecondedition.description_text: In an uncertain and complex world, learning is more important than ever before. In fact, it can be a competitive advantage. Teams and organizations that learn rapidly deliver greater customer value faster and more reliably. Furthermore, those teams are more engaged, more productive, and more satisfied. The most effective way to enable teams to learn is by holding regular retrospectives. Unfortunately, many teams only get shallow results from their retrospectives. This book is filled with practical advice, techniques, and real-life examples that will take retrospectives to the next level—whether your team is co-located, hybrid, or remote. This book will help team leads, scrum masters, and coaches engage their teams to learn, improve, and deliver greater results.

developers.developer-name: Esther Derby, Diana Larsen, David Horowitz

guidingstarokrs.description_text: Tired of traditional OKRs that stifle innovation and demotivate teams? The Guiding Star OKR framework offers a refreshing new approach to goal setting, emphasizing purpose, unified direction, and adaptability. Best-selling author Staffan Nöteberg distills knowledge from diverse industries, teaching you to create a compelling “Guiding Star” vision that inspires, aligns, and empowers teams. Learn to foster intrinsic motivation, embrace continuous adaptation, and unlock strategic agility for sustainable success in today’s ever-changing business world.

createyoursuccessfulagileproject.description_text: You think agile techniques might be for you, but your projects and organization are unique. An “out-of-the-box” agile approach won’t work. Instead, unite agile and lean principles for your project. See how to design a custom approach, reap the benefits of collaboration, and deliver value. For project managers who want to use agile techniques, managers who want to start, and technical leaders who want to know more and succeed, this book is your first step toward agile project success.

creatinggreatteamssecondedition.description_text: People are happiest and most productive if they can choose what they work on and who they work with. Self-selecting teams give people that choice. Build well-designed and efficient teams to get the most out of your organization, with step-by-step instructions on how to set up teams quickly and efficiently. This new edition highlights ten years of additional insights, real-world case studies, and adaptations for remote and hybrid environments. Learn from the successes and challenges faced by organizations worldwide as they implemented self-selection, and discover a practical roadmap to unlocking team potential and fostering a culture of autonomy and engagement.

becomeaneffectivesoftwareengineeringmana.human_name: Become an Effective Software Engineering Manager
becomeaneffectivesoftwareengineeringmana.description_text: Software startups make global headlines every day. As technology companies succeed and grow, so do their engineering departments. In your career, you’ll may suddenly get the opportunity to lead teams: to become a manager. But this is often uncharted territory. How do you decide whether this career move is right for you? And if you do, what do you need to learn to succeed? Where do you start? How do you know that you’re doing it right? What does “it” even mean? And isn’t management a dirty word? This book will share the secrets you need to know to manage engineers successfully.

helpyourbosshelpyou.description_text: Develop more productive habits in dealing with your manager. As a professional in the business world, you care about doing your job the right way. The quality of your work matters to you, both as a professional and as a person. The company you work for cares about making money and your boss is evaluated on that basis. Sometimes those goals overlap, but the different priorities mean conflict is inevitable. Take concrete steps to build a relationship with your manager that helps both sides succeed.

effectiveremotework.description_text: The office isn’t as essential as it used to be. Flexible working hours and distributed teams are replacing decades of on-site, open-plan office culture. Wherever you work from nowadays, your colleagues are likely to be somewhere else. No more whiteboards. No more water coolers. And certainly no Ping-Pong. So how can you organize yourself, ship software, communicate, and be impactful as part of a globally distributed workforce? We’ll show you how. It’s time to adopt a brand-new mindset. Remote working is here to stay. Come and join us.

becomeagreatengineeringleader.description_text: As you step into senior engineering leadership roles, you need to make an impact, and you need to make it fast. This book will uncover the secrets of what it means to be a successful director of engineering, VP of engineering, or CTO. With a hands-on, practical approach, it will help you understand and develop the skills that you need, ranging from how to manage other managers, to how to define and execute strategy, how to manage yourself and your limited time, and how to navigate your own career journey to your desired destination.

forgeyourfuturewithopensource.human_name: Forge Your Future with Open Source
forgeyourfuturewithopensource.description_text: Free and open source is the foundation of software development, and it’s built by people just like you. Discover the fundamental tenets that drive the movement. Take control of your career by selecting the right project to meet your professional goals. Master the language and avoid the pitfalls that typically ensnare new contributors. Join a community of like-minded people and change the world. Programmers, writers, designers, and everyone interested in software will make their mark through free and open source software contributions.

softwareestimationwithoutguessing.description_text: Developers hate estimation, and most managers fear disappointment with the results, but there is hope for both. You’ll have to give up some widely held misconceptions: let go of the notion that “an estimate is an estimate,” and estimate for your particular need. Realize that estimates have a limited shelf-life, and re-estimate frequently as needed. When reality differs from your estimate, don’t lament; mine that disappointment for the gold that can be the longer-term jackpot. We’ll show you how.

stressequation.description_text: Workplace stress is not the weakness of individuals; it’s caused by systemic problems. Armed with the insights in this book, you can identify, analyze, and systematically reduce the factors that lead to poor health, low productivity, and personal burnout. This book gives you a framework for understanding stress, and a vocabulary to make it easier to discuss it among colleagues. Stress can be fixed; find out how.

real-worldkanbansecondedition.description_text: When your team is stressed, priorities are unclear, and nobody knows what anyone else is doing, morale and productivity plummet. But it’s never too late to improve team cohesion, boost engagement, and save your derailed projects. Dive into five real-world Kanban case studies and discover how teams like yours created a shared focus, improved time to market, and turned things around. With illustrations of the Kanban boards, diagrams, and graphs that led to success, you’ll get a look behind the scenes. This updated edition even includes a diverse library of Kanban board examples to jump-start your journey.

practicalaandbtesting.description_text: Whether you’re a catalyst for organizational change or have the support you need to create an engineering culture that embraces A/B testing, this book will help you do it right. The step-by-step instructions will demystify the entire process, from constructing an A/B test to breaking down the decision factors to build an engineering platform. When you’re ready to run the A/B test of your dreams, you’ll have the perfect blueprint.

fixingyourscrum.description_text: Broken Scrum practices limit your organization’s ability to take full advantage of the agility Scrum should bring: The development team isn’t cross-functional or self-organizing, the product owner doesn’t get value for their investment, and stakeholders and customers are left wondering when something—anything—will get delivered. Learn how experienced Scrum masters balance the demands of these three levels of servant leadership, while removing organizational impediments and helping Scrum teams deliver real-world value. Discover how to visualize your work, resolve impediments, and empower your teams to self-organize and deliver using advanced coaching and facilitation techniques that honor and support the Scrum values and agile principles.

businesssuccesswithopensource.description_text: Free and open source software (FOSS) is everywhere and is the driving force behind nearly all software developed today. It doesn’t matter what industry your company is in: Learning more about how to use, contribute to, and release FOSS can be the strategic edge that your company needs. With the proper knowledge and approach, open source can form the cornerstone of a digital transformation effort, increase developer retention, decrease recruiting cycles, ensure reliable security, and reinforce the company brand. All this and more, by shifting your company’s FOSS strategy from accidental to intentional.

savethechildren.description_text:
Donations to support Save the Children are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Save the Children believes every child deserves a future. In 120 countries around the world, they work every day to give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn in school and protection from harm. When crisis strikes, and children are most vulnerable, they are among the first to respond and the last to leave. They ensure children’s unique needs are met and their voices are heard. They do whatever it takes to reach every last child.

designingdatagovernancefromthegroundup.human_name: Designing Data Governance from the Ground Up
designingdatagovernancefromthegroundup.description_text: Businesses own more data than ever before, but it’s of no value if you don’t know how to use it. Data governance manages the people, processes, and strategy needed for deploying data projects to production. But doing it well is far from easy: Less than one fourth of business leaders say their organizations are data driven. In Designing Data Governance from the Ground Up, you’ll build a cross-functional strategy to create roadmaps and stewardship for data-focused projects, embed data governance into your engineering practice, and put processes in place to monitor data after deployment.

savethechildren.description_text:
Donations to support Save the Children are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Save the Children believes every child deserves a future. In 120 countries around the world, they work every day to give children a healthy start in life, the opportunity to learn in school and protection from harm. When crisis strikes, and children are most vulnerable, they are among the first to respond and the last to leave. They ensure children’s unique needs are met and their voices are heard. They do whatever it takes to reach every last child.

basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Video games are nothing without detailed, atmospheric environments for your characters to move around in. Those can be tough to build from scratch, so we have the perfect solution: a bundle full of game development assets for every type of story and gameplay from the good folks at Leartes! This bundle of nearly 100 assets and asset packs for Unreal, Unity, and Godot has everything you need to design your neon-drenched cyberpunk city, your imposing fantasy castle, or your feudal Japanese village, along with nature assets for pine forests, jungles, and desert ruins. Get started building the game of your dreams, and help support the education and empowerment resources at Lotus Outreach International with your purchase!

vfxsmoke_unrealengine.description_text:
Welcome to the innovative world of Leartes Studios, where passion for gaming meets Unreal Engine’s automation possibilities.

We have developed a new tool for the gaming community: The Ultimate Lighting and Camera Tool, which accelerates and simplifies your Unreal Engine lighting and camera workflow.

Ultimate Lighting and Camera Tool Features:

To create a light in your scene, open the Lighting Tool window and drag one of the Point Light, Spot Light, or Rect Light icons onto the scene.

You can easily change the behavior and illumination of the light by choosing from a variety of function types.

Apply masks to lights with just a few clicks.

Change the light type quickly.

Create light sensors for interacting with characters.

Adjust the lightmaps for the entire scene or based on specific assets.

Camera Manager Tool for easy setup angle-by-angle.

Control your cameras easily.

The HDRI Backdrop Manager creates HDRI with a few clicks.

Ultimate Lighting and Camera Tool Version 1.1 Release Notes

Documentation Shortcut: Added a documentation shortcut to the tool menu for quick access.

Technical details

Create custom lights converting them each other easily

Apply custom light masks to the lights

Creating light sensor interacting with characters

Automatically adjust lightmap densities for certain meshes on the scene or asset's settings

The HDRI Backdrop Manager It creates easy setup for HDRI's

Quick access the project settings in terms of the lighting main setup .

bakercharacterunrealengine.description_text:
Abandoned Swimming Pool Environment with 146 Unique Meshes

Render pipeline compatibility

The Built-in Render Pipeline is Unity's default render pipeline. It is a general-purpose render pipeline that has limited options for customization. The Universal Render Pipeline (URP) is a Scriptable Render Pipeline that is quick and easy to customize, and lets you create optimized graphics across a wide range of platforms. The High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP) is a Scriptable Render Pipeline that lets you create cutting-edge, high-fidelity graphics on high-end platforms.

Unity Version

Built-in

URP

HDRP

2021.3.6f1

vfxdust_unrealengine.description_text: Step into the world of ZBrush as you embark on a journey to craft three miniature figures . Our Udemy course is your ticket to mastering the sculpting, material, and landscapes. Our instructor from Brazil, Celito Moura, has been working in the cinema industry since 2003 as a 3D artist, concept artist, storyboardist, texture artist, and art director. His clientele includes Cartoon Network, Napster, Banco do Brasil, and many others. Currently he is focused on the area of miniatures and collectibles. With his experience, this course is tailored for from beginners and experienced artists. You’ll start by gaining a solid foundation in the principles of sculpting, clothing and anatomy. Throughout the course, you’ll engage in a practical project designed to sharpen your skills and deepen your understanding of the creative process. By the end, you’ll emerge with a portfolio-worthy environment, ready to showcase your talent and impress potential employers. Key topics include: Understanding the principles of sculpting Navigating ZBrush’s robust toolset and features Using and creating brushes Posing, finalizing, and optimizing your models for rendering Exporting your miniature for production Taking renders on Blender and Photoshop Whether you’re an enthusiast looking to break into the gaming industry or a professional seeking to refine your craft, this course offers invaluable insights and practical skills to elevate your character art.

stylizedhouseinteriorgodotengine.description_text:
Step into the world of Unreal Engine 5 as you embark on a journey to craft an abandoned church environment and level art in Unreal Engine 5. Our Udemy course is your ticket to mastering the 3D level art , lighting , set dressing and creating landscapes.

Led by the seasoned industry professional, Louis Lin, this course is tailored for both beginners and experienced artists alike. You’ll start by gaining a solid foundation in the principles of level artistry, learning how to execute your vision with precision.

Throughout the course, you’ll engage in a practical project designed to sharpen your skills and deepen your understanding of the creative process. By the end, you’ll emerge with a portfolio-worthy environment, ready to showcase your talent and impress potential employers.

Key topics include:

Understanding the principles of level artistry and environmental design

Navigating Unreal Engine 5’s robust toolset and features

Implementing dynamic lighting and atmospheric effects to enhance realism

Incorporating storytelling elements to create an immersive experience

Taking cinematic renders with the help of Cine Camera Actor

Implementing post process volumes for color correction

Using DaVinci Resolve for color grading and final touches

Whether you’re an enthusiast looking to break into the gaming industry or a professional seeking to refine your craft, this course offers invaluable insights and practical skills to elevate your level art.

classiclimousineanddriveableandfunctiona.description_text: Step into the world of concept design as you embark on a journey to craft a high tech industrial city in Blender and Photoshop. Our Udemy course is your ticket to getting familiar with concept art, Blender and Photoshop Led by an industry professional, Josef Sury, this course is tailored for both beginners and slightly experienced artists. You’ll start by gaining a solid foundation in the principles of concept art, learning how to execute your vision with precision. Throughout the course, you’ll engage in a practical project, TechForge Megapolis, designed to sharpen your skills and deepen your understanding of the creative process. By the end, you’ll emerge with a portfolio-worthy concept art, ready to showcase your talent and impress potential employers. Key topics include: Understanding the principles of concept art and conceptual city design Navigating Blender and Photoshop’s toolsets and features Adding and modifying materials in Blender Implementing lighting and atmospheric effects to enhance realism on concept art Incorporating storytelling elements to create an immersive experience Taking cinematic renders with the help Eevee render engine Overpainting on a base image in Photoshop Whether you’re an enthusiast looking to break into the gaming industry or a professional seeking to refine your craft, this course offers invaluable insights and practical skills to elevate your concept art knowledge.

cyberpunkmegapackunrealengine.description_text:
Here is our 6 months of hardworking as Leartes Team , Cyberpunk Environment Megapack with over 650 Unique Meshes , a lot of BluePrints for easy use , Merged Building Parts for less Drawcalls in scene , we did our best for optimization since the Project is huge and there are a lot of Assets We have created renders by camera angles and additional Set Dressing + Lighting for each camera angles ,we include those Set Dressing and Lightings for camera angles in Sub-Levels , We also have Base Lighting and Base Directional Light in Sublevel for Showcase Map , if you will have any questions on how to use it you can get fast support via email Pack includes Building Parts , Cyberpunk Vehicles (2 Cars , 1 Taxi , 1 Train , 1 Drone , 1 Motorbike ) , and Sets of each types of props (like Benches set , Lights set , Billboards Set and much more ) , Building Parts are customizable so you can create your own building easily by combining different Building Parts , We have Slums and more Futuristic Building Types and Storefronts all has Vertex Paintings of Dirt . We have cubemaps on windows cubemaps are taken from our previous Cyberpunk Interior Packages , so windows are looking like they have 3D interiors , We have rain vertex painting on roads and you can paint or erase rain effect from roads / pavements and even adjust speed and size of raindrops

stylizedhouseinteriorunityengine.description_text:
Step into the world of Unreal Engine 5 as you paint three different types of props in Substance 3D Painter. Our Udemy course is your ticket to mastering the texturing.

Led by the seasoned industry professional, Bagher Bolouri, this course is tailored for both beginners and experienced artists. You’ll start by gaining a solid foundation in the principles of modelling, texturing and level art, learning how to execute your vision.

Throughout the course, you’ll engage in three different practical projects designed to sharpen your skills and deepen your understanding of the creative process. One will be a complex chair, another will be denim pants and the last one will be a gun. By the end, you’ll emerge with a portfolio-worthy environment, ready to showcase your talent and impress potential employers.

Key topics include:

Establishing a preliminary spatial design by creating a reference board and a 3D blockout

Understanding the principles of PBR texturing and materials

Preparing high and low poly models and exporting in Maya

Navigating Substance 3D Painter's robust toolset and features

Creating materials for soft surfaces, hard surfaces and cloth.

Exporting texture sets and rendering the end product in Blender

Whether you’re an enthusiast looking to break into the gaming industry or a professional seeking to refine your craft, this course offers invaluable insights and practical skills to elevate your texture and material skills.

fps4kwesternguns_vol4unrealengine.description_text:
Welcome to the innovative world of Leartes Studios, where passion for gaming meets Unreal Engine’s automation possibilities. Leartes Studios is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of being a leading art outsourcing company.

Object Distribution Changes *We have Added a feature that automatically organizes completed distributions into folders based on the preset name and distribution version. This new functionality helps keep the distributed objects well-organized and makes managing and accessing them more accessible.

Two new distribution types, Tunnel and Disk, were added.

A new button has been added to the interface that allows you to automatically create a preset from the selected assets in the Content Browser.

A new global distribution properties parameter has been added. This parameter allows you to override the distribution properties for the generated object distribution data, giving you global control over distribution properties.

A new parameter called "Spawn Density" has been added, which allows bulk adjustment of object count quantities in a specified proportion, enabling easy increase or decrease of object placements.

We have added a debug option that creates parentheses-shaped lines around objects spawned in a similar way to group actors. This feature helps visualize the placement and distribution of objects, making it easier to debug and analyze the scene.

Features

Quick access to the tool interface with a custom tool menu

The customizable window for personal uses

Allows you to automatically create a preset from the selected assets in the Content Browser.

A new parameter called "Spawn Density" has been added, which allows bulk adjustment of object counts quantities in a specified proportion, enabling easy increase or decrease of object placements.

No custom class dependencies can be removed from the project at any time

Create and simulate an unlimited number of different mesh types in various arrangements.

Save and reuse builds you created using presets

Combine your presets with Mixer to instantly create more complex structures.

The mission of nonprofit Lotus Outreach is to empower vulnerable women and children living in poverty. With affiliates in seven countries and local NGO partners in India and Cambodia, LO is a global community that believes empowerment is the heart of sustainable change.

from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Video games are nothing without detailed, atmospheric environments for your characters to move around in. Those can be tough to build from scratch, so we have the perfect solution: a bundle full of game development assets for every type of story and gameplay from the good folks at Leartes! This bundle of nearly 100 assets and asset packs for Unreal, Unity, and Godot has everything you need to design your neon-drenched cyberpunk city, your imposing fantasy castle, or your feudal Japanese village, along with nature assets for pine forests, jungles, and desert ruins. Get started building the game of your dreams, and help support the education and empowerment resources at Lotus Outreach International with your purchase!

Establish a dark, moody atmosphere for your ghost-themed podcast with Terrifying Tension and Gothic Castle tracks, or build the audioscape for your planet-jumping sci-fi RPG with Replicant World or Desert Planet tracks. Create the perfect mix for any situation with the Epic Royalty-Free Music Collection Vol. 3 by Joel Steudler, and help support Breakthrough T1D with your purchase!

apocalypsetime.description_text: It's the end of the world, and these ten atmospheric tracks from composer Joel Steudler strike an apocalyptic mood. Eerie, gritty soundscapes bridge horror and sci-fi. Check your rad levels and survive amid the ruins of civilization.

wastelandwanderer.description_text: Bleak sounds of grim survival in the blasted remains of civilization make this ten track set from composer Joel Steudler one to keep in your emergency kit. Gritty electromechanical noises permeate the ambient soundscapes of the end times.

untamedwilds.description_text: Venture forth into uncharted territory with ten tracks of atmospheric fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler. Flickery flutes, ominous horns in the deep, and shimmery moments of beauty highlight the danger and wonder in nature's wilds.

heroicjourneys.description_text: Atmospheric but tuneful orchestral adventures take these ten tracks from composer Joel Steudler there and back again. The destination is not as important as the journey, and any loot you get along the way!

gothiccastle.description_text: Harpsichord, organ, and dark vocal atmospheres set the stage for creepy Counts, red Barons, and anyone in a gothic nightmare. These ten tracks from composer Joel Steudler evoke the baroque and beckon to the darkness.

cosmicreaches.description_text: Serene synthscapes and stirring orchestra take the listener into the depths of space. Ten tracks of ambient, exploratory sci-fi music from composer Joel Steudler lift the spirit to the stars and beyond.

replicantworld.description_text: Analog synths echo through atmospheric soundscapes, calling to all artificial intelligences. These ten tracks of cyberpunk futurism from composer Joel Steudler will not fail the Voight-Kampff test, but don't let their human origin deter you from using them to score your sci-fi.

ancientrealms.description_text: These ten tracks of atmospheric fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler will transport the listener to aeons past. Sounds of antiquity drift through mysterious spaces, evoking wonder and magic. Fit for historical settings or imaginary lands.

mysticalmagic.description_text: Cast a spell with ten tracks of magical atmospheric fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler. Plucked strings, mystical bells, harp and swelling flutes establish an arcane ambiance. Wizard approved!

dungeondepths.description_text: What's more classic than a festering, moldy dungeon? Take these ten tracks of fantasy atmosphere from composer Joel Steudler and delve deep. But not too deep. You might wake something up that's better left slumbering. At least this quiet, eerie underscore won't raise the dead. Or will it?

jdrf.description_text:
Donations to support Breakthrough T1D are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

As the leading global type 1 diabetes research and advocacy organization, we help make everyday life better while driving toward cures. We are opening doors that were once closed by T1D diagnosis. We lead the way to more effective solutions by connecting the brightest minds to advance treatments, influence policy, and improve access to care.​ By driving innovation forward, we will make T1D a thing of the past.

desertplanet.description_text: Space sure has a lot of desert planets, full of spiritual voices and weird ways. These ten tracks of atmospheric sci-fi music from composer Joel Steudler set a cinematic mood and bring the stars down to earth. Mysterious and... sandy.

heavenandhell.description_text: Take a ten track trip into the non-denominational afterlife with these atmospheric explorations from composer Joel Steudler. Mythology and theology inspire the duality of celestial and subterranean sounds.

hauntedhalls.description_text: Ghostly piano, unsettling voices, scary strings and ominous orchestra make these ten tracks of atmospheric horror music from composer Joel Steudler frightfully fitting. Don't close your eyes, and check under the bed before you go to sleep.

databreache_joelsteudler.description_text: Dark, dystopian beats and pulses set a cybperpunk agenda with these ten tracks of sci-fi atmosphere from composer Joel Steudler. The future may not be bright, but at least it will sound cool.

terrifyingtension.description_text: Ten tracks of terrifying horror atmospheres from composer Joel Steudler will tingle the spine, stand hair on end, and possibly induce mild panic. Choppy strings slice into ambient soundscapes and pierce the underscore.

We lead the way to more effective solutions by connecting the brightest minds to advance treatments, influence policy, and improve access to care.​ By driving innovation forward, we will make T1D a thing of the past.
