Gear up with the Super Weapons Asset Pack by Superhive and add unbeatable value to your personal asset library! Choose from exceptionally detailed models or a colorful lowpoly look. Unleash the boom with a wide range of weapon types and genres, from medieval fantasy to sci-fi, like mounted machine guns, ninja shuriken, Smith & Wesson revolvers, rocket launchers, and so much more. Don’t bring a basic knife to a gunfight—get the Super Weapons Asset Pack and add exciting firearms and beyond to your next project! All these products work with the free, open-source software, Blender, and many assets function across 3D applications for maximum bang for your buck!
basic_data.short_marketing_blurb: These weapon assets bring the BOOM!
basic_data.description:
These weapon assets bring the BOOM!. Looking for blockbuster-level weaponry for your next project? Gear up with the Super Weapons Asset Pack by Superhive and add unbeatable value to your personal asset library! Choose from exceptionally detailed models or a colorful lowpoly look. Unleash the boom with a wide range of weapon types and genres, from medieval fantasy to sci-fi, like mounted machine guns, ninja shuriken, Smith & Wesson revolvers, rocket launchers, and so much more. Don’t bring a basic knife to a gunfight—get the Super Weapons Asset Pack and add exciting firearms and beyond to your next project! All these products work with the free, open-source software, Blender, and many assets function across 3D applications for maximum bang for your buck!

Pay $30 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $827. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $30 purchase. Pay $30 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. Keys are redeemed through Superhive.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support One Tree Planted. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

weaponspbrcollection.description_text: This Weapon Collection includes 7 detailed models: FN SCAR-L, stylized M4 Carbine, Magnum British Sniper, hand-painted pistol, Glock 17, RPG-7 rocket launcher, and an M416 with telescope. Each weapon is crafted in Blender 3.0 and 3ds Max 2020, using real-world scales and high-quality 4K–8K PBR textures made in Substance Painter 7.2. Models are manually unwrapped, optimized, and ready for rendering or game integration. All materials are properly named, with no special plugins required. Formats include .max, .blend, .fbx, .obj, and .dae

25mountedweaponspack2.description_text: It was time to bring more firepower to the fleet — introducing the Mounted Weapons Pack Vol. 2! This new collection expands your arsenal with a fresh set of 25 detailed sci-fi mounted weapons, perfect for spaceships, mechs, or defense turrets. Each model features a 1K PBR texture set, clean UVs, and optimized geometry for efficient use in games or cinematic renders. Designed for easy kitbashing and customization, these weapons blend seamlessly with futuristic or industrial scenes. Upgrade your armory and give your creations the heavy artillery they deserve with this powerful second edition!

mostpopularroundsandgamereadyandpbrandpl.human_name: Most Popular Rounds / Game Ready / Pbr / +Lods
mostpopularroundsandgamereadyandpbrandpl.description_text: Equip your military projects with Most Popular Rounds – Game Ready, a curated set of 15 fully textured ammo models derived from our 75-round library. Each model is game-optimized (~600 triangles at LOD0) and includes 3 LODs, clean straight UVs, and real-world scale for accurate placement. Textures come as three PBR sets (128px, 512px, 2048px) so you can balance quality and performance. Delivered in FBX, OBJ, and BLEND formats, the pack contains 3 shotgun, 6 handgun, and 6 rifle rounds, including 9mm Luger, .45 ACP, 5.56×45 NATO, .308 Winchester, 12/16/20 gauge, and more. Ready for immediate import into engines and pipelines—perfect for shooters, sims, and military visualization.

onetreeplanted.description_text:
Donations to support One Tree Planted are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
We are a non-profit focused on global reforestation. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

shotgunmegapack.description_text: Arm your scenes with futuristic firepower—six distinct sci-fi shotguns, plus a sniper rifle, lever-style Winchester, arm cannon, recurved bow, and two bonuses: a rigged robotic combat arm and an asymmetric soldier. Every model is UV-unwrapped (1–4K), textured in PBR + Toon (LBS + outline), and ready for games or cinematics. Several weapons include multiple color variants, while key assets like the dual-barrel shotgun and recurved bow are rigged and animated. Built in Blender and textured in Substance Painter, this pack delivers clean geometry, organized materials, and export-ready .blend, FBX, and OBJ formats for effortless engine integration.

stylizedm4carbineweapon.description_text: Elevate your arsenal with the Stylized M4 Carbine, a high-quality, detailed, and fully animatable low-poly weapon model perfect for games like MMORPGs, shooters, or strategy titles. Built for Unity, Unreal, and CryEngine, it features movable parts including a bolt carrier, trigger, magazine, fire selector, and more. The pack includes 3 handguard variants, 2 barrel types, and multiple magazine options for customization. Textured in 4K–8K PBR, with both metallic/roughness and specular/gloss workflows, all materials are optimized for real-time use. Supplied in .fbx, .obj, .dae, .blend, and .mtl formats—ready for seamless import into any modern engine.

25mineandprecisedimensionsandgamereadyan.human_name: 25 Mine / Precise Dimensions / Game Ready / Base Mesh / Vol .4
25mineandprecisedimensionsandgamereadyan.description_text: Speed up your props pipeline with the Mine Base Mesh Pack — 25 meticulously researched mine base meshes spanning WWI, WWII, and modern types. Each asset includes low- and high-poly variants, clean quad topology, precise real-world dimensions, and UV-unwrapped, subdivision-ready geometry optimized for baking and sculpting. Models are vertex-painted for quick masking during texturing and supplied in both _base and _beveled versions to suit hard-surface and stylized workflows. Delivered in OBJ and FBX formats, this pack includes classic and specialist mines (Claymore, PMN, S-Mine, MON-50, OZM-72, and more) — ideal for games, film, and visualization pipelines.

dynamicvfx_elementalassetpack.description_text: Unleash the power of elements in Blender with the Dynamic VFX – Elemental Asset Pack! This version adds the Muzzle Flash effect for quick, customizable weapon visuals and the Better Array modifier for effortless, animatable arrays. Create fire, lightning, weather, particle, and energy effects with intuitive geometry nodes. Perfect for stylized or cinematic scenes, each asset is fully customizable, Eevee and Cycles ready, and built for Blender 3.6+. Includes real-time controls, PBR materials, and lifetime free updates. Bring your worlds to life with professional, dynamic VFX ready to drag, drop, and animate!

50grenadeandprecisedimensionsandgameread.human_name: 50 Grenade / Precise Dimensions / Game Ready / Base Mesh / Vol .3
50grenadeandprecisedimensionsandgameread.description_text: Equip your projects with the Grenade Base Mesh Pack: 50 accurately researched grenade base meshes spanning WWI, WWII, and modern types. Each model includes low- and high-poly variants, clean quad topology, precise real-world dimensions, and UVs ready for baking. Models are subdivision-ready and vertex-painted for seamless masking during texturing. Package contains both _base and _beveled versions for every asset, optimizing workflow for game and film pipelines. Delivered in OBJ and FBX, these production-ready grenades speed up prop creation and integrate into any pipeline. Save now.

25tacticalattachmentsandcleantopologyand.human_name: 25 Tactical Attachments / Clean Topology / Uv / Base Mesh
25tacticalattachmentsandcleantopologyand.description_text: Upgrade your weapon designs with the Tactical Gun Attachment Pack — 25 high-quality, production-ready 3D attachments crafted for realism and fast integration. Includes scopes & optics, suppressors, grips & stocks, laser sights, flashlights, rail adapters, and specialty mounts. Each model features clean quad topology, accurate real-world scale, UV-unwrapped layouts, vertex-painted masking for easy material swaps, and subdivision-ready geometry for sculpting or LOD-friendly optimization for games. Models include mounting points and consistent naming conventions for quick rigging and attachment. Prepared for immediate use in shooters, cinematic scenes, and VR/AR projects, assets are easy to customize and come exported in OBJ, FBX, and BLEND formats for seamless engine import and look-dev.

machinegun_ingramm10smg.description_text: Step into the action with this accurate, high-quality 3D model of the Ingram M10 SMG — ideal for real-time games, cinematics, or realistic renderings. Crafted in Blender, the model includes both the weapon and a matching bullet, fully UV-unwrapped and textured with 4K PBR maps (base color, height/normal, metallic, roughness) to deliver stunning visual fidelity. Available in OBJ, FBX, and .blend formats, it’s ready for seamless integration across Unity, Unreal, and other engines. With subdivision-ready geometry and clean topology, it’s perfect for high-detail close-ups or optimized game use. Licensed royalty-free and tuned for modern pipelines — bring your tactical scenes to life.

riflebasic_mocappack.description_text: Equip your characters with the Rifle BASIC Animation Pack — a mid-size set of MCO rifle animations designed for realism and versatility in Blender. Featuring 88 animations, including 13 aim offsets and 7 split jumps (for a total of 192 files), this pack covers all essential movements: standing, aiming, firing, reloading, holstering, walking, crouching, running, and jumping. Each motion includes Root Motion and In-Place options for maximum flexibility. Optimized for Auto Rig Pro and Rokoko Studio, it includes the MotusMan_v55 rig and a fully textured M4 rifle, making it easy to drop into your scene and start animating instantly.

gunbarrelgenerator.description_text: Create realistic gun barrels in seconds with the Gun Barrel Generator, a fully procedural geometry-nodes system for Blender. This tool gives you complete control—adjust every diameter, length, and groove setting, add threads or chambers, and instantly produce low- or high-poly barrel models. Built with clean topology and optimized for game or film workflows, it prevents overlapping geometry and keeps things production-ready. Choose between materials per component, tweak bevels, and integrate effortlessly with your weapon assemblies. Includes example files and full support. Royalty-free with free lifelong updates—make your next weapon build faster and smarter.

firearms3dmodels_weaponpack.description_text: Arm your project with the Firearms 3D Model Package — a professional low-poly weapon collection featuring 61 unique assets across pistols, SMGs, shotguns, rifles, launchers, snipers, and explosives. Optimized for games, animation, VR/AR, and rendering, each model maintains a consistent, stylized look and real-world scale. Using a universal PNG texture for efficiency, the pack minimizes memory use while ensuring cohesive visuals. Compatible with Blender 3.3+, Unity, Unreal, and major 3D formats (FBX, OBJ, GLTF, STL). Explore the free demo with 8 weapons and experience the quality of this fully game-ready arsenal.

smithandwessonrevolver.description_text: Bring authenticity to your project with the Smith & Wesson Model 10 Snub Nose Revolver – .38 Special, a game-ready 3D model built with precision and attention to detail. Featuring 12,511 triangles, clean three-tile UDIM UVs, and two 4K PBR material variations (clean light and dirty dark), it’s optimized for both realism and performance. Includes a .38 Special ammo model with 2K PBR textures in light nickel and worn brass finishes, crafted to real-world scale. Available in FBX, OBJ, and BLEND formats, this pack delivers professional-quality weapon assets ready for use in games, cinematics, or rendering pipelines.

rocketlauncherrpg-7.description_text: Add authentic firepower to your project with the Rocket Launcher RPG-7, a highly detailed, game-ready 3D model crafted to real-world scale. Featuring clean topology, manually unwrapped UVs, and 4K–8K PBR textures, it delivers exceptional realism and performance in any engine. Perfect for military, shooter, or cinematic scenes, all materials and objects are properly named and organized for easy integration. Tested in Unity, the model requires no special plugins and is optimized for smooth workflow. Includes .blend, .fbx, .obj, and .dae formats, ensuring compatibility across pipelines and fast import into any 3D or game environment.

50hammerbasemesh_vol02gameready.human_name: 50 Hammer Base Mesh - Vol 02 Game Ready
50hammerbasemesh_vol02gameready.description_text: Speed up your workflow with the 50 Hammer Base Mesh Pack — a versatile collection of game-ready, low-poly hammer models perfect for artists, designers, and game developers. Each mesh features clean quad topology, UV unwrapping, and is fully editable for customization or sculpting. Optimized for both low-poly and high-poly use, every model is under 10K tris and ready for baking, TurboSmooth, or Subdivide. Ideal for use across various game engines and 3D projects, the pack includes preview PDFs and JPEGs for easy browsing. Available in Blender, 3ds Max, FBX, and OBJ formats—ready to drop into your next creation.

dynamitelowpoly4ktextures.description_text: Explode your scene with the Dynamite | Lowpoly | 4K Textures model — a game-ready dynamite prop crafted for real-time use. With only 2,086 faces (4,026 triangles), it’s optimized for performance without sacrificing visual fidelity. Real-world scaled and UV-unwrapped (one UV set), it includes full 4K PBR textures (Base Color, Roughness, Metallic, Normal, AO) in PNG format. Delivered in .blend, .fbx, and .obj, this asset integrates seamlessly into Blender, Unity, and Unreal workflows. Ideal for games, animations, or stylized environments, the model supports Cycles, Eevee, and Unity-Game engine pipelines. Ready to rig, bake, and deploy — royalty-free and hassle-free.

25ninjaweapons_basemesh_vol04gameready.human_name: 25 Ninja Weapons - Base Mesh - Vol04 (Game Ready)
25ninjaweapons_basemesh_vol04gameready.description_text: Sharpen your workflow with 25 Ninja Weapons – Base Mesh Vol. 04, a versatile collection of game-ready 3D models designed for character artists, game developers, and cinematic creators. Each weapon features clean quad topology, is UV-unwrapped, and stays under 10K tris, making them ideal for both low-poly and high-poly use. Every model is properly named, fully editable, and TurboSmooth/Subdivide ready for detailed sculpting or baking. Perfect for creating katanas, shuriken, and stealth-inspired props, this pack is compatible with Blender, 3ds Max, FBX, and OBJ, giving you efficient, production-ready assets for any project.

trailfxsv2.description_text: Transform your Blender animations with Trail FXs v2, a next-generation collection of procedural trail templates powered by simulation and geometry nodes. Create stunning trails, particles, and weapon effects instantly—no node knowledge required. This version adds liquid trails, fire and smoke sprites, new emitters, particle collisions, color gradients, and 30+ customizable materials. Supports custom blade shapes, from lightsabers to wings, with full EEVEE and Cycles compatibility. Enjoy intuitive controls, asset browser integration, and optimized materials for glowing, dynamic motion. Trail FXs v2 makes cinematic trailing effects effortless, flexible, and endlessly creative.

75ammoandprecisedimensionsandgamereadyan.human_name: 75 Ammo / Precise Dimensions / Game Ready / Base Mesh / Vol .1
75ammoandprecisedimensionsandgamereadyan.description_text: Equip your pipeline with precision: the Ammo Base Mesh Package delivers 75 accurately measured ammo base meshes researched and modeled to real-world dimensions. Each asset includes low- and high-poly variants, clean quad topology, UV-unwrapped meshes, and subdivision-ready geometry — ideal for games, visualization, and 3D printing. Models are vertex-painted for easy masking, optimized for baking, and exported in OBJ and FBX formats. Included are popular calibers from .22 LR to .50 BMG, niche rounds like 7.62×25 Tokarev, specialty sizes, and shotgun loads. Ready-made, scalable, and production-focused — save time with a comprehensive, accurate ammunition library.

ultimatestylizedweapons_medievalfantasya.human_name: Ultimate Stylized Weapons: Medieval, Fantasy & Sci-Fi Game
ultimatestylizedweapons_medievalfantasya.description_text: This pack offers around 500 unique weapon models across three distinct styles — Medieval, Fantasy, and Sci-Fi — covering all major melee, ranged, and throwable types. Each model averages a polygon counts of 650 triangles and includes movable parts for animation-ready interactivity. Weapons are optimized for both first- and third-person views, with clean geometry and strong silhouettes ideal for real-time games. The Fantasy and Sci-Fi variants reimagine the same designs with unique themes, from mystical crystals to high-tech energy cores. Perfect for developers seeking variety, performance, and cohesive style across multiple game worlds.

bullets.description_text: Equip your arsenal with “Bullets”—a precision-crafted set of low-poly ammunition models built for games and real-time visuals. This pack features two distinct bullet types (short pistol and long rifle) with clean quad geometry, non-overlapping UV layouts, and full PBR materials optimized for production. Each model includes separate high-resolution texture sets and proper naming for effortless pipeline integration. Formats include FBX, OBJ, and BLEND, making the assets compatible with Unity, Unreal, or any 3D engine. The models support real-world scale and offer subdivision flexibility for close-up renders. Perfect for shooters, weapon designers, or game-asset libraries.

75muzzlebrakeandgamereadyandbasemeshandv.human_name: 75 Muzzle Brake / Game Ready / Base Mesh / Vol .5
75muzzlebrakeandgamereadyandbasemeshandv.description_text: Upgrade your weapons pipeline with the Muzzle Brake Base Mesh Pack — 75 precisely researched real-world and sci-fi muzzle brake designs ready for production. Each asset includes low- and high-poly variants, clean quad topology, UV-unwrapped layouts, and subdivision-ready geometry for easy sculpting or baking. Models are built to real-world scale and supplied in both _base and _beveled versions to suit hard-surface and stylized workflows. Delivered in OBJ and FBX formats, this pack speeds up weapon prototyping, customization, and engine integration—ideal for games, film, and visualization pipelines.

retrolasergun.description_text: Step into sci-fi style with this Retro Laser Gun, a high-quality 3D model built for game, film, or collectible use. With 83 ,064 triangles (41,816 faces), it provides strong detail while remaining optimized for real-time render engines. The model is real-world scaled and features 11 UV sets plus 2 K PBR textures including base color, roughness, metallic, normal and AO maps. Formats included: .blend, .fbx, .obj for smooth integration into Blender, Unity, Unreal and more. Bonus: the pack includes two scenes in the Blender project (one with lighting and one clean model) so you can render immediately. Tested in Cycles and Eevee, and published with royalty-free licensing.

stylizedfnscarlpbrgun.description_text: Enhance your arsenal with the FN SCAR-L Low Poly Game-Ready Gun, a high-quality stylized weapon ideal for MMORPGs, shooters, strategy, or cartoon-style games. Built with clean topology and fully animatable parts—including bolt carrier, trigger, magazine, fire selector, and charging handle—it’s optimized for performance and realism. The model features 4K PBR textures (roughness, metallic, normal, AO, base color) and includes specular/gloss maps for flexible workflows. Compatible with Unity, Unreal, and CryEngine, this asset delivers excellent results across engines. Provided in .fbx, .obj, .dae, .stl, and .blend formats—ready to drop into any real-time project.

25mountedweaponspack.description_text: Does your new spaceship need serious firepower? Or maybe your battle mech could use an upgrade? The Mounted Weapons Pack delivers 25 detailed sci-fi weapon models ready to attach to ships, vehicles, or robots. Each weapon includes a 1K PBR texture set, clean topology, and optimized geometry for real-time performance in games or cinematic scenes. From heavy cannons to rapid-fire turrets, these hard-surface assets are designed for easy customization and integration. Perfect for space combat, mech shooters, or futuristic environments—equip your creations with the firepower they deserve!

coldweapons-3dmodels-weaponpack.description_text: Equip your scenes with the Cold Weapons 3D Model Package, a professional low-poly collection of 100 unique melee and improvised weapons. From katanas and axes to pipes, bats, and farm tools, this versatile pack covers everything from medieval to modern survival gear. Optimized for games, VR/AR, animation, and 3D printing, all models use a universal PNG texture to minimize memory use while maintaining a cohesive art style. Built to real-world scale with clean topology and collisions, the pack supports Unity, Unreal, Blender, C4D, Maya, 3DSMax, FBX, OBJ, GLTF, and STL. Try the free demo and experience premium quality, ready for any project.

25knivesandcleantopologyanduvandbasemesh.human_name: 25 Knives / Clean Topology / Uv / Base Mesh
25knivesandcleantopologyanduvandbasemesh.description_text: Enhance your 3D workflow with the Knife Base Mesh Pack, featuring 25 meticulously crafted knife models designed for versatility and realism. Each mesh is accurately scaled, UV-unwrapped, and built with clean, optimized topology for efficient use in any project. Perfect for games, cinematic assets, or prop design, these knives are subdivision-ready for smooth customization and high-detail results. Whether you’re modeling realistic blades or stylized weapons, this pack provides a solid foundation for any creative workflow. Includes 25 unique meshes in OBJ, FBX, and BLEND formats, ready for immediate use and iteration.

50militaryshellandprecisedimensionsandga.human_name: 50 Military Shell / Precise Dimensions / Game Ready / Base Mesh / Vol .2
50militaryshellandprecisedimensionsandga.description_text: Military Shells Base Mesh Pack — 50 precisely researched shell models covering WWI, WWII, and modern munitions. Each asset includes low- and high-poly variants, clean quad topology, accurate real-world dimensions, UV-unwrapped layouts, and subdivision-ready geometry for baking and sculpting. Models are vertex-painted for quick masking and supplied in both _base and _beveled versions to suit hard-surface or stylized workflows. Delivered in OBJ and FBX formats, these production assets speed up game, film, and assets

pistolbasic_mocappack.description_text: Unlock essential handgun motion with the Pistol BASIC Animation Pack — a mid-size collection of mocap animations optimized for Blender, Unity, Unreal, and other real-time workflows. Featuring 86 animations, including 13 aim offsets, 7 split-jumps, and a total of 195 files, this pack covers all pistol fundamentals—idle, stand, crouch, walk, jog, run, aim, fire, reload, swap and transitions. Each motion comes in both Root Motion and In-Place formats for maximum flexibility. Built on the MotusMan_v55 skeleton, with full Blender-native support and retargeting compatibility (Auto Rig Pro, Rokoko Studio), these animations let your characters draw, fire and move with seamless realism.

projectileeffectssuite.description_text: Bring your Blender scenes to life with Projectile FX Suite—a powerful procedural node system that generates bullets, rockets, arrows, lasers, and more at the click of a button. Great for game cinematics or real-time renders, it automates impact decals, particle bursts, muzzle flashes, trajectory motion, and more. Features include homing projectiles, wobble animation, full real-time simulation, and a fully customizable muzzle-flash system. Simply point at a target and hit “play”. Built for Blender 4.1+ with lifelong free updates, it’s intuitive, efficient, and visually impressive. Includes detailed documentation and example scenes for quick start.

stylizedhandpaintedpbrpistol.description_text: Bring style and precision to your project with this high-quality stylized low-poly handgun, optimized for all modern game engines. Designed to real-world scale, it features 9 separate parts (barrel, slide, grip, hammer, magazine, and more) ready for rigging and animation. Textured in 4K PBR with dedicated sets for Unreal Engine 4 and Unity 5, each includes base color, normal, roughness, metallic, and AO maps in .tga format. Perfect for any game genre, this weapon delivers performance and detail for real-time use. Provided in FBX, OBJ, DAE, 3DS, STL, and BLEND formats with clean topology—only 5,945 polygons for efficient rendering.

dualbarrelsci-fishotgun.description_text: Emit futuristic firepower with the Dual-Barrel Sci-Fi Shotgun — a high-detail, rigged and animated model built for production. It features twin muzzles, integrated cooling fins, and a top-hinge reload mechanism for quick shell swaps in shock-waves of cinematic action. Fully UV-unwrapped and textured in 1K, 2K & 4K resolutions, it supports both PBR and Toon (LBS + outline) shader workflows for stylized or realistic games. Delivered in a .blend file (with Mirror, Subdivision, and Bevel modifiers intact) and export-ready formats, this asset is optimized for FPS, third-person action, or sci-fi scenes, and instantly usable in Unity, Unreal, or custom engines. Clean topology, 12 objects, a unified material set (+ outline variant), and royalty-free licensing make it a smart choice for developers and artists alike.

vdbforgesmokeanddustlite.human_name: VDB Forge Smoke and Dust Lite
vdbforgesmokeanddustlite.description_text: Unlock dramatic smoke and dust effects with VDB Forge – Smoke & Dust Lite, a streamlined library designed for Blender users. This lite edition offers 25% of the full asset set, including volumetric simulations of trails, drifts, plumes, and bursts — all trained for use with Cycles and Eevee. Quickly drop high-quality VDBs into scenes and stylize environments, explosions, or dynamic backgrounds without digging through node setups. Features automatic import tools, ready-to-use file layouts, and royalty-free licensing. Upgrade later to the Pro version when you’re ready for the full 100% library. Add cinematic smoke & dust to your workflow with no headache and full Blender asset compatibility.

onetreeplanted.description_text:
Donations to support One Tree Planted are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
We are a non-profit focused on global reforestation. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Super Weapons pack from Superhive
from_bundle.short_marketing_blurb: These weapon assets bring the BOOM!
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Bullets, Trail Fxs V2, Retro Laser Gun, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Looking for blockbuster-level weaponry for your next project? Gear up with the Super Weapons Asset Pack by Superhive and add unbeatable value to your personal asset library! Choose from exceptionally detailed models or a colorful lowpoly look. Unleash the boom with a wide range of weapon types and genres, from medieval fantasy to sci-fi, like mounted machine guns, ninja shuriken, Smith & Wesson revolvers, rocket launchers, and so much more. Don’t bring a basic knife to a gunfight—get the Super Weapons Asset Pack and add exciting firearms and beyond to your next project! All these products work with the free, open-source software, Blender, and many assets function across 3D applications for maximum bang for your buck!
from_bundle.author: Autotroph

basic_data.human_name: Game Creator Mega Bundle Vol. 2
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Want to build your own RPG with unique environments and exciting characters but just have no clue where to start? Find what you need in this Mega Bundle full of detailed, high-quality assets for games of every genre–everything from tilesets to build your perfect cursed school, map packs to design the dreariest dungeon, character generators for all your sprites, battlers, and faces, and music for every big moment and setting, from your darkest nightmares to your seediest cyber bars. Get over 100 asset packs to bring your game to life in Unreal Engine and Unity, and support Type 1 diabetes charity Breakthrough T1D with your purchase at the price of your choosing!
basic_data.description:
Bring your game to life. Want to build your own RPG with unique environments and exciting characters but just have no clue where to start? Find what you need in this Mega Bundle full of detailed, high-quality assets for games of every genre–everything from tilesets to build your perfect cursed school, map packs to design the dreariest dungeon, character generators for all your sprites, battlers, and faces, and music for every big moment and setting, from your darkest nightmares to your seediest cyber bars. Get over 100 asset packs to bring your game to life in Unreal Engine and Unity, and support Type 1 diabetes charity Breakthrough T1D with your purchase at the price of your choosing!

Instructions can be found here.

Pay $5 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $2,040. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $5 purchase.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publishers and to support Breakthrough T1D. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

cursedkingdomstwistedforestmusicpack.human_name: Cursed Kingdoms Twisted Forest Music Pack
cursedkingdomstwistedforestmusicpack.description_text: Return to the Cursed Kingdoms and venture outside the walls into the wilderness with twenty tracks of dark fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Ominous, eerie instruments and menacing metal guitars set the stage for spider attacks, terrifying trees, and an occasional rest at the campfire. Be sure to post a guard, though. You never know what's lurking in the night. Also includes fifteen music events to punctuate important moments!

tinytalesrpgheroes_anewbeginning.human_name: Tiny Tales RPG Heroes: A New Beginning
tinytalesrpgheroes_anewbeginning.description_text: Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT Heroes: A New Beginning, you will find 8 unique and expertly crafted heroes for your game! The world has fallen prey to a corrupt order, and only those that band together to fight evil shall prevail! With this pack, you will have all the necessary tools to bring unique heroes to life in your game! Portraits, Side View Battlers, Static Battlers and Map Sprites, all included to start an epic journey!

medievaltownandcountryplusinteriorsbundl.human_name: Medieval Town and Country + Interiors Bundle
medievaltownandcountryplusinteriorsbundl.description_text: Everything you need is inside to create literally thousands of unique characters including their spritesheets (with over 50 animations supported!), facesets, busts, and paperdolls. On top of that, there are an absolute ton of tiles included for you to build the world you want to create. Each Medieval pack builds on the others, offering nearly countless combinations of characters and giving an ever-expanding vast library of tiles and other resources to build your dream game. Each character template and piece of equipment/clothing/etc comes with the resources to create over 50 different spritesheets ranging from walking, running, sleeping, sitting, side-view combat, down poses, idling, and much more – all in 4 and 8 directions! On top of that, each comes with the resources to make busts, paperdolls, and facesets!

rpgbattlers_9th50monsters.description_text: Tyler Warren returns with something dark and menacing. These 50 monster silhouettes are prefect for adding some horror/mystery and depth to your next project. These images are multifunctional and can be used as battlers, logos, or incorporated into other ambience within your game world. Specifically designed with form and shape in mind, these monsters have character all their own.

pvgamesscifigameassets.description_text: Space... the final frontier. The time has come where Earth is explored and charted and mankind must turn its collective attention upward, to the stars. This resource pack gives you the power to create your own sci-fi maps and games with a focus on a wide-range of interiors for ships, space stations, bases, buildings, and whatever else you can imagine.

sc_pixelportraits1.description_text: This colorful set of Pixel Art portraits offers a wealth of variety for your game. Inspired by the likes of Stardew Valley and Final Fantasy IV, this pack brings to life a multitude of personalities, formatted in many different ways, to fully unlock their potential as well as to allow you ease of use within your specific game project.

2point5dworldwar2tiles.description_text: Are you looking for tanks, jeeps, trucks, motorcycles, and other World War II assets for your 2D game projects? Barbed wire, tank traps? Well, look no further! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

isometricdungeondesignercavesedition.description_text: With the Isometric Dungeon Designer CAVES EDITION, you can create a myriad of isometric cave dungeons for the needs of your isometric game. A dark cavern filled with ogres, a chilling ice cavern teeming with frost golems, or a volcanic passage to demonic realms. Drag the pieces into your favorite image-editing tool with robust layer support (I recommend photoshop), and start building!

rpgbattlers_5th50monsters.description_text:
From the dark side of Tyler Warren comes 50 dynamic monster silhouettes perfect for battle or game logos

Tyler Warren is back again with something you haven’t seen before. These 50 monster silhouettes are perfect for adding some horror/mystery and depth to your next project. These images are multifunctional and can be used as battlers, logos, or incorporated into other ambiance within your game world. Specifically designed with form and shape in mind, these monsters have character all their own.

This pack contains: - 50 unique silhouettes for use at battlers, logos, or ambiance with matching facesets - Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV and VX Ace, and other RPG Makers - All battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues - Included is a background screen overlay that can be applied over battlebacks to give them a stylized texture to match each battler - Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) - Art style similar in spirit to the classic whimsical RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) - Each battler is also provided in an optional “soft-filtered” version - All of the 50 battlers has a new red color variant in multiple sizes, bringing the total useful battlers to 100 - Add an extra dimension to your project with greater depth and versatility for each black battler - Not a fan of red? Simply adjust the hue value when importing into RPG Maker to your color preference

visustellaatelier_rocksoresandminerals.human_name: VisuStella Atelier: Rocks, Ores, and Minerals
visustellaatelier_rocksoresandminerals.description_text: Hey kid you want some goods? We got some goods... *opens coat* Do your heroes need some ingredients to concoct the ultimate panacea? Maybe your blacksmithing game can make use of LOTS of ores? Does your laboratory, restaurant or shop inspired games need some wares? Are you tired of tiny item images and want to make your game stand out? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines aren't enough, so let us help you out with our atelier!

cybercitymusicpack_vol03.description_text: Tour the bright lights, bits, and bytes of the future's shining beacon of merged life between man and machine with twenty tracks of cinematic orchestronica from composer Joel Steudler.

medievalwarfareknightstemplarbundle.description_text: Everything you need is inside to create literally thousands of unique characters including their spritesheets (with over 50 animations supported!), facesets, busts, and paper-dolls. On top of that, there are an absolute ton of tiles included for you to build the world you want to create. Each Medieval pack builds on the others, offering nearly countless combinations of characters and giving an ever-expanding vast library of tiles and other resources to build your game.

25dcharacterpieces_vol2.description_text: This second volume of PVGames character pieces provides you with a number of pieces of equipment, clothing, hair styles, and other items to equip your characters with! You can freely mix and match the various pieces to create an exponential number of characters; and since each piece of clothing is its own separate graphic, you can easily re-color and edit pieces to fit your needs. All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

cursedkingdomsmonsterpack.description_text:
The Cursed Kingdom has seventeen dark fantasy beasts for your heroes to battle in your isometric(or popular virtual tabletop systems) or sideview game (such as RPGmaker MV)!

Set includes: Abyssal Grub, Chomper, Devourer Spawn, Disciple, Enthralled, Ettin, Eye Ghost, Voracious Demon, Flayer, Ghelthukkos, Hellhunger, Prophet, Reaver, Unchained, Veiled, Wraith Footman and Wraith Knight

sc_visage2023.description_text: Lemme get straight to the point: Faces, Painted. Born from imagination, unbound by restrictions or expectations. An artist's permit to paint freely without the usual constraints of asset art, this asset pack is truly a menagerie; characters of all sorts, from the devilish jester to the magical girl to the mysterious sun mask are allowed to emerge from the unconscious mind. How Freudian! Included in this pack are 32 delicately painted portraits, formatted in all sorts of ways for ease of use in RPG Maker engines, or wherever you prefer.

animationscollection4_nocturne.description_text: Animations Collection IV: Nocturne mixes the themes of "darkness" and "sound" together to create a visual spectacle that will make lasting impressions on your audience. With these easy-to-use animation sprite sheets, Nocturne is a must-have for designers looking to add a touch of the extraordinary to their projects.

25dcharacterpiecesvol3.description_text: This third volume of PVGames character pieces provides you with a number of pieces of equipment, clothing, hair styles, and other items to equip your characters with! You can freely mix and match the various pieces to create an exponential number of characters; and since each piece of clothing is its own separate graphic, you can easily re-color and edit pieces to fit your needs. All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

morderndaymusicmegapackvol3.description_text: This mix of metal, retro electronica, and contemporary orchestra will solidly set your game in the modern moment! These twenty tracks from composer Joel Steudler cover a variety of moods from serene to headbanging, and some drama in-between. Also included are twenty five sound effects suitable for the present day, and fifteen music events to use as transitions, game-overs, or stirring stingers!

morderndaymusicmegapackvol2.description_text: Don't get stuck in the past! This collection of contemporary music hops genres and delivers a powerful pack of tracks with modern orchestra, punk rock, and a detour into the 1980s. Included are 25 tracks, 15 music events, and 30 SFX by Composer Joel Steudler.

rpgbattlers_6th50monsters.description_text:
Tyler Warren returns with his 6th set of amazing battlers! It’s time for some Monster Evolution!

Tyler Warren brings us his 6th set of 50 monster battlers, with theme of “monster evolution.” Each of the battlers is presented in three stages of evolution. It’s time to add a fun new dynamic to your battler lineup by starting small, evolving, and evolving again! Use them to evolve in battle, or create a family of monsters (mom, dad, babies), or stronger versions of the same monster, showing their faces as your game progresses! Artwork similar in style to Tyler’s growing library of colorful characters.

This pack contains: - Over 50 unique battlers with matching facesets - Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker MV and VX Ace, and other RPG Makers - All battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small; let the slime be the boss with no scaling issues - Included is a background screen overlay that can be applied over battlebacks to give them a stylized texture to match each battler - Battlers also come in recommended sizes (proportional to each other) - Art style similar in spirit to the classic whimsical RPG characters of Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) - Each battler is also provided in an optional “soft-filtered” version

cursedkingdoms_twistedforestmonsterpack.human_name: Cursed Kingdoms - Twisted Forest Monster Pack
cursedkingdoms_twistedforestmonsterpack.description_text: The Cursed Kingdom expands to the Twisted Forest... it contains eighteen dark fantasy beasts for your heroes to battle in your isometric (or popular virtual tabletop systems) or sideview game (such as RPGmaker MV)! Check out the whole Cursed Kingdoms set here: Ironfur Direwolf, Ironfur Embertail, Galefire Extractor, Ironfur Beast, Ironfur Direbear, Lich Lord, Maw, Marsh Lurker (and submerged), Fungoid Armature, Myconid Zombie, Obsidian Undead Dragon, Osidian Marauder, Ravener, Swarm Bloodsucker, Swarm Trencher, Terrormaw Spider, Terrormaw Queen, Thresher Tree. Also includes the hero token: The Legendary Captain Slayde.

sccrystalportraiture.description_text: SeraphCircle returns with a colorful cast of characters, formatted in a variety of sizes to bring that zing to your game's world. Expressive enough to embody a variety of personalities and identities, but flexible enough to fit any narrative. Idealized as a set of 24 NPCs, they pull their own weight as protagonists, antagonists and recurring characters.

medievaltownsfolk.description_text: As you take your first steps into this new town, you are met by a beggar woman pleading for alms. Just up the street you see a comely lass sweeping the cobblestones and from somewhere nearby the hammering of metal on metal from the Blacksmith’s shop. No town is complete without an assortment of characters to inhabit it. This add-on pack includes characters that each have completely unique looping animations to give your towns atmosphere and make your maps livelier. There is a Blacksmith, a Bard, a Barkeep, a Beggar, a Jester, a Merchant, a Street Sweeper, a Baker, a Farmer, a Miner, a Scribe, a Mysterious Skulker, and two children, all of which have unique animations in addition to over 50 other animation spritesheets for walking, running, sitting, sleeping, kneeling, and much more.

isometricdungeondesignercyberpunk.description_text: With the Isometric Dungeon Designer CYBERPUNK EDITION, you can create a variety of isometric cityscapes and building interiors for the needs of your isometric game. An abandoned alleyway filled with technorippers, a sprawling Megablok, or a derelict office building filled with your rival corp's data.

kingdomsandconquestmusicpack.description_text: Fly high with orchestral adventure music for your fantasy games with these twenty tracks from composer Joel Steudler! Rousing themes with bold melodies will urge air pirates into action, set the stage for storming an enemy castle, and bring you home to welcoming towns.

talesofthefareastmusicpack.description_text: Tales of the Far East Music pack is a collection of 15 music themes. From the busy markets in the heart of the desert to the quiet solitude of beautiful bamboo groves, each song is a melodious journey that invokes emotion. The use of traditional instruments brings an air of authenticity to each piece, while keeping it current and ready for use in your projects.

mythos_reawakening.description_text: From the corner of your eye you can see it, but you dare not look directly. It walks towards you… no, that isn’t right, it is more of a jerking, shambling motion but… not quite that, either. It defies any articulation. But there is one thing you are certain of. You never should have opened the Black Book. As a sequel to the hugely popular Mythos Horror resource set, Mythos: Reawakening presents you with a huge number of assets to craft your horror masterpiece!

jdrf.description_text:
Donations to support Breakthrough T1D are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

As the leading global type 1 diabetes research and advocacy organization, we help make everyday life better while driving toward cures. We are opening doors that were once closed by T1D diagnosis. We lead the way to more effective solutions by connecting the brightest minds to advance treatments, influence policy, and improve access to care.​ By driving innovation forward, we will make T1D a thing of the past.

tinytalescodeark_galaxyfrontiersnpcsprit.human_name: Tiny Tales Code Ark: Galaxy Frontiers NPC Sprite Pack
tinytalescodeark_galaxyfrontiersnpcsprit.description_text: Tiny Tales Code Ark is designed for those who are looking to add a futuristic, epic touch to their game. In CA: Galaxy Frontiers NPC expansion we bring federation robots, space pirates and monstrous aliens! This is the sprite version of Tiny Tales Code Ark Battlers Vol.1: Galaxy Frontiers.

cursedkingdomsmusicpack.description_text: Venture into the unknown with twenty tracks of dark fantasy music from composer Joel Steudler! Folk sounds from ancient times mix with metal guitar and eerie atmospheres to offer you a distinctly dangerous sound. Stirring themes evoke the unsettling mood of a place lost to otherworldly enemies and chaotic magic. You will find a little solace and a lot of adventure in this collection of troubled tracks.

rpgbattlers-littlemonstersandrobots1.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 1
rpgbattlers-littlemonstersandrobots1.description_text: Tyler Warren adds 8 little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 1 of 10. Previously Tyler's packs were release in sets of 50, but to help get monsters into the hands of creatives faster, he's releasing these smaller packs at a much lower price point. When complete, there will be 10 packs in this set (80 total monsters).

retrofantasymusicpack_vol1.description_text: Bring the golden era sound of JRPGs to your game with twenty tracks of high fantasy from composer Joel Steudler! Memorable melodies recall the classic soundtracks of the 16-bit and 32-bit console era and fill your game with nostalgic charm. Adventure, action and emotion fill this pack. Also includes twenty Music Events!

retrofantasymusicpack_vol2.description_text: Venture into the classic past of JRPGs with twenty tracks of high fantasy from composer Joel Steudler! Memorable melodies recall the classic soundtracks of the 16-bit and 32-bit console era and fill your game with nostalgic charm. Adventure, action and emotion fill this pack. Also includes twenty Music Events!

retrofantasymusicpack_vol3.description_text: <p>Bring the golden era sound of JRPGs to your game with twenty tracks of high fantasy from composer Joel Steudler! Memorable melodies recall the classic soundtracks of the 16-bit and 32-bit console era and fill your game with nostalgic charm. Adventure, action and emotion fill this pack. Also includes twenty Music Events!</p>

rpgbattlers-littlemonstersandrobots8.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 8
rpgbattlers-littlemonstersandrobots8.description_text: A tale of Death and Robots! Tyler Warren adds 8 more little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 8 of 10.

tinytales_dungeons_vol22dtilesetassetpac.human_name: Tiny Tales: Dungeons Vol.2 2D Tileset Asset Pack
tinytales_dungeons_vol22dtilesetassetpac.description_text: Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: Dungeons, we cover even more expansions, such as snowy fortresses and castles!

rpgbattlers_8th50monsters.description_text: Tyler Warren’s 8th set of 50 graphic assets is designed to maximize the usefulness of your Time Fantasy collection. This additional tribute, is primarily based on art from Time Fantasy Monsters pack and in connection with the 7th 50, gives you a detailed monster version of each of his fantastic sprites. Use these graphics for detailed cut scenes, battles, story development, dialog, titles and much more. Use this pack to bridge styles and open up your project to a pool of 400+ monsters from Tyler Warren’s growing library, while adding the perfect compliment to your Time Fantasy assets.

medievalhighseas.description_text: Now you can take your adventures out onto the High Seas with a new pack of resources for creating tropical islands, high-sea adventures, and more! The Medieval: High Seas resource pack comes with tropical island tiles, new buildings and building interior tiles, ships and shipwrecks, themed clothing for character-creation, and yes, even some new monsters that lurk in the depths of the abyss!

rpgbattlers3rd50monsters.description_text: Lots more slimes and dragons! Continuing in the style and charm of his previous battlers, this 3rd pack of 50 monsters by artist Tyler Warren takes you to the next level. Get ready for a fresh new visual dimension for your professional or amateur project. Similar to Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series monsters, this pack features a healthy array of "Slime Monsters" and a gorgeous variety of powerful Dragons; a must have for any fantasy adventure game. This pack contains: Over 50 unique battlers with matching facesets; files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker or other game-making software; presented in sizes ranging from large to small; each battler is also provided in an optional "soft-filtered" version.

isometricdungeondesigner.description_text: With the Isometric Dungeon Designer, you can create a myriad of fantasy, isometric dungeons for your game! Sprawling multi-floor dungeons, massive boss battle arenas, or a dark fortress littered with ruins and the undead. Load the pieces into your favorite image-editing tool with .png/layer support (I use photoshop), and start building! Set includes: 10+ Floor tiles, stairs, and isometric grid, 25+ Walls and Doors, 100+ doodads to give your map life, and 3 premade sample maps!

northfolk_tols.description_text:
Prepare to forge epic sagas with this set of game asset tiles! The Northfolk are a hardy people, having to live in the frozen tundra where most other people dare not tread. Their long ships give them an advantage when traversing the coasts, allowing them to raid freely where they will before taking their treasures back to their hearth and home.

This asset pack contains well over 2,100 tiles that allow you to create rugged villages, frozen tundra, and more! Inside you'll find longships and boats, buildings, trees, bushes, building interiors, and numerous decorative items.

These tiles are fully compatible with all other PVGames tiles from the RPGTools line of assets.

inspirationalmusicpack_vol4.description_text: The newest entry in the popular Inspirational series rounds out the packs with a variety of themes with an ambient and funky undertone. Composed by JDB Artist, Inspirational Vol. 4 is a fantastic addition to your music library. Whether you're looking for a modern tune with personality or a more classic fantasy piece, this pack is a must-have!

inspirationalmusicpack_vol5.description_text: Inspirational Vol. 5 delivers a soaring blend of epic orchestral power, emotional depth, and futuristic sci-fi energy. Each composition is crafted to inspire creativity and amplify storytelling, whether for a cinematic trailer, an inspiring montage, or a dramatic game sequence. From sweeping strings and grand choirs to radiant synth textures and pulsing rhythms, this collection captures the essence of triumph and imagination.

inspirationalmusicpack_vol1.description_text: The first volume of the Inspirational Music Pack series sets the stage with a bold and versatile collection of tracks that capture excitement, atmosphere, and emotion in equal measure. From thrilling adventures to tense, cinematic moments, this debut release lays the foundation for the series’ signature sound. Composed by JDB Artist, Inspirational Vol. 1 features 37 high-quality tracks in OGG, MP3, and lossless WAV formats—over 64 minutes of pure music spanning Adventure, Modern Day, and Suspense & Horror styles. Whether you’re creating an epic journey or an intense dramatic scene, this pack offers the perfect soundtrack for your next project.

inspirationalmusicpack_vol2.description_text: The second volume of the Inspirational Music Pack series expands the collection with a powerful and diverse set of tracks designed to elevate any creative project. From pulse-pounding action cues to haunting suspense themes, every piece is crafted to inspire emotion and energy. Composed by JDB Artist, Inspirational Vol. 2 delivers 35 high-quality tracks plus 2 bonus tracks in OGG and lossless WAV formats—over 60 minutes of pure music across Action, Adventure, Emotional, Modern, and Suspense & Horror styles. Whether you’re scoring a game, trailer, or cinematic project, this pack provides a dynamic palette of sounds ready to bring your vision to life.

inspirationalmusicpack_vol3.description_text: The third entry in the acclaimed Inspirational series brings an impressive collection of tracks that blend emotion, energy, and modern flair. Featuring a perfect balance between heartfelt melodies and powerful cinematic moments, this pack is designed to spark creativity for any project. Composed by JDB Artist, Inspirational Vol. 3 includes 37 high-quality tracks in OGG, MP3, and lossless WAV formats—spanning Emotional, Epic, and Modern styles. With a wide range of instruments and moods, this royalty-free collection is an essential addition to your creative toolkit for both commercial and non-commercial projects.

sci-fibackgrounds.description_text: This pack includes 20 backgrounds with 13 wall variants, it was originally designed for RPGmaker MV, but feel free to use these backgrounds in whatever scifi project you have in mind!

classicsci-fimusicpack.description_text: Fly to the moon and welcome little green men to your home planet with these twenty tracks of classic cinematic science fiction music from composer Joel Steudler. Otherworldly theremin and synths mix with orchestral drama in an homage to the far out future envisioned by movies of the 1950s.

sc_monsterpack4.description_text: After a long hiatus, the SeraphCircle series of monster packs is back, with 10 brand new creatures to inhabit your game. Colorful yet edgy, this is the fourth iteration on a series of monster packs that totals over 90 unique creatures -- all with inventive, meaningful variations that add versatility and depth to your game design possibilities. From witches to scarecrows to contorted mutations of humans, this new pack doubles down the series' horror tinges, while remaining playful in presentation.

animationsselect_earth.description_text: Animations Select - Earth features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Shake things up and impress your audience with these groundbreaking spectacles!

nightmaresmusicpack.description_text: A mix of terrifying intensity and dreamy flow make this music pack a unique and must-have music collection. Nightmares takes you on a musical journey that quickly moves from eerie and slightly unsettling into tense and purely terrifying. Inspired by some of the best horror games and TV shows, each song is expertly composed by JDB Artist to create the perfect ambiance. Whether you're working on a monstrous chase scene or a simple flashback scene, Nightmares is the pack for you.

rpgbattlers4th50monsters.description_text:
Tyler Warren applies his creative spin on the RPG Maker VX Ace RTP battlers, redesigned to match Tyler’s style and other battlers!

Tyler Warren is back again with this 4th set of 50 battlers, this time re-imagining the default RPG Maker VX Ace batters. This pack features 50 battlers, including 17 Tyler Warren original characters and 33 RTP-matching monsters. Tyler’s delightful and unique style has been applied to the default Run-Time Package (RTP), matching all 32 monsters from the Monster1-3, and Big Monster1-2 sprite sheets. Bring new life to classic RTP characters and combine with Tyler’s other packs for an ever expansive library in the same fun style, likened to Dragon Quest or a children’s book illustration.

galefirerpgfantasycharactersnpcandheropa.description_text: The GalefireRPG Fantasy Characters NPC/Hero pack contains 27 characters to use in your isometric/virtual tabletop or sideview game (such as RPGmaker). This pack contains: 11 ladies of various jobs and races, 11 lads of various jobs and races, and 4 power armored warriors. Also includes portraits of all characters included!

visustellaworlds_cursedschool.description_text: Do you wish to create games inspired by games like Corpse Party? Or maybe just a slice of life game? Enjoy a crisp pixel art aesthetic but don't want to sacrifice resolution? With the VisuStella Cursed School tiles, you can craft your perfect place of learning, or perhaps something more sinister...

visustellaarmory_jewelry_vol1.description_text: Do you need magical artifacts? Does your character need some jewelry for magical purposes or maybe as a gift? Do you need some gear to help your heroes face dangerous foes? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines aren't enough, so let us help you out with our armory!

rpgbattlers1st50monsters.description_text:
Bring back the whimsical and colorful characters of classic RPGs with 50 unique battlers from the imagination of illustrator Tyler Warren!

If you make RPG games, then this is for you. This pack of 50 monsters is created in the spirit of early console RPGs, and can bring new life to your game, whether you're working on a commercial product or a personal project. Carefully crafted in a style comparable to the immensely popular Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series, this set features monsters ranging from cute to colossal. Trolls, bugs, slimes, elementals, beasts, animals, flyers, and many others. Adaptable to any game making software, and specifically applicable to RPG Maker software.

cursedkingdoms_badassbossesminipack.description_text: The Cursed Kingdom expands with the Badass Bosses MiniPack... herein are four dark fantasy beasts, a custom Slayde npc, and a pack of four hero NPCs, for your players to battle in your isometric (or popular virtual tabletop systems), sideview game (such as RPGmaker MV), or VN game!

tinytales_overworld2drpgtilesetassetpack.human_name: Tiny Tales: Overworld 2D RPG Tileset Asset Pack
tinytales_overworld2drpgtilesetassetpack.description_text: Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: Overworld, we cover the outdoors and town settings!

animationsselect_wind.description_text: "Animations Select - Wind" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Add these to your project to blow away your audience and take the market by storm!

tinytales_worldmap2drpgtilesetassetpack.human_name: Tiny Tales: World Map 2D RPG Tileset Asset Pack
tinytales_worldmap2drpgtilesetassetpack.description_text: Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: World Map, we cover several biomes and miniaturized areas!

rpgbattlers_pixelstyle1.description_text: In response to many requests for more retro-pixel graphics needed by game makers, Tyler Warren has completely remastered his monster collection in this the 1st of 3 pixel-style graphic packs. This pack is a careful assortment of 93 of Tyler’s battlers recreated in a pixel art style, presented in 9 different color palettes and 4 sizes, for an impressive total of 3,348 graphic image files in one pack. If you’re working on your retro or pixel game these are the monsters you need!

medievalheroes_1.description_text: The city wall fell to the beasts. The towns people flooded the inner keep in seek of sanctuary while the ravenous creatures tear apart their homes. The kingdom cries out for a hero. Eight step forward. Sometimes your story requires a hero that is not just another average joe, but someone who can stand out from the other characters and hold a more epic standing. Inside this resource pack you will find eight unique characters, each with numerous spritesheets (including animated side-view battlers!), busts, faces, paperdolls, and even full pictures depicting each one that can be used for cut-scenes, promotional art, or whatever else you can think of!

northfolk_charactercreatorkit.description_text: Craft legendary characters that embody the spirit of the north! Shape your own sagas by mixing and matching different character elements to forge unique personas and characters for your game world. This asset pack contains nearly 100 pieces for you to create your own nordic-themed characters! From weapons and hair to armor and clothing! All character pieces come in 8 directional facings with a multitude of supported animations. There are over 70 animations for the character sprites and a total of nearly 2,500 frames of animation per piece. Also included are 16 large character portraits that can be used as paper dolls, busts, face-sets, and more. These character pieces are fully compatible with all other PVGames character pieces with the RPGTools asset label so you are free to mix and match and grow your extensive character piece library!

animationscollection_cursedkingdoms.description_text: Animations Collection: Cursed Kingdoms is a special pack inspired by the "Cursed Kingdoms" collaboration effort between several artists and asset creators. These animations were designed to complement the abyssal/creature aesthetics of the other assets in the Cursed Kingdoms lineup. They're also readily usable on their own and perfect for any project that needs a touch of horror or something sinister.

evfxslash.description_text: "EVFX Slash" features 20 gorgeous visual effects AND complementary sound effects, allowing you to add that professional polish to your projects easier than ever before and awe your audience!

animationscollection3_thaumaturgy.description_text: Building upon the two previous collections, Animations Collection III: Thaumaturgy broadens the variety of visual spectacle you can deploy to wow your players. With full-screen magic animations and spell-casting animations bundled together, this pack is perfect for any project featuring mages and casters.

moderndaysfx.description_text: Open your ears and you'll hear all around you the sounds of everyday life. The birds outside, the clatter of cookware, doors and drawers opening and shutting, water splashing and pouring... this is the backdrop of our lives and of your game! Everyday items and situations are covered in this collection, with multiple takes on most sounds so you have a variety to choose from. Listen up! This set of Modern Day SFX will liven up your world.

animationsselect_dark.description_text: "Animations Select - Dark" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Embrace the darkness and plunge heroes and foes alike into the abyss!

sc_pixelmonster1.description_text: The SeraphCircle monster series is back, and along with its new HD monsters, this brand new line of pixel art monsters makes its debut! Featuring a wide variety of creatures in this nature-tinged set, these sprites pack detail and creativity in a cohesive palette for your game, all in a lovingly crafted pixel art style. From skeleton-pupeteering plants to sorcerous druids to bizarrely proportioned apes, this pack is sure to aid anyone lacking a green thumb or needing a creative jolt!

medievalplaguebringersplusdiseasedtownbu.human_name: Medieval Plague Bringers + Diseased Town Bundle
medievalplaguebringersplusdiseasedtownbu.description_text:
They came by the thousands. Rats. Not ordinary rats, but massive ones, with crooked and grotesque visages, dripping bile and blood. That’s how it started. That was how the end of our civilization began.

What plague or disease will overcome your world? Will the dead rise up from their graves? Will the wildlife turn feral? The Medieval: Plague Bringers pack gives you the resources to add all sorts of vile undead and plague-ridden denizens and locales to your game world. With dozens of new character creation pieces, new monsters, and tons of brand new tiles, you can fill your Medieval world with a whole new set of horrors.

visustellaarmory_firearms_vol1.description_text: Do you need some gear to help your heroes face dangerous foes? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines aren't enough, so let us help you out with our armory!

sci-fifoesmonsterpack.description_text: 42 Scifi Foes for your heroes to battle in your isometric or sideview game! Set includes: Loader, Mech, Soldier, Laborer, Drakos, Gun Drone, Laser Drone, Saw Drone, Enslaver Drone, Enslaver Fleshshaper, Enslaver Hulk, Enslaver Lurker, Exovore Flyer and Titan, Enslaver Prime, Heavy trooper, Heavier trooper, citizen, junkbots, sleekbots, space pirates, spawn aliens, check out the screenshots! Also includes 4 hero sprites: Imperator, Centurion, Legionnaire, Praetorian

madnessmusicpack_vol2.description_text: Madness Vol. 2 delivers an unstoppable surge of energy, fusing orchestral grandeur with electronic ferocity. Each composition is designed to pull you into heart-pounding showdowns where every strike, roar, and rhythm drives the action forward. From cinematic clashes to pulse-racing boss encounters, this collection turns every battle into an unforgettable spectacle.

isometricdungeondesignerexpansion.description_text: With the Isometric Dungeon Designer EXPANSION PACK, you have some new tools in your kit for map making. The floor pieces were made for usability, allowing you to easily mass out your floors without worrying about the edges having thickness, and I've primarily used the broken walls for dilapidated buildings in my outdoor edition sets, but I'm sure they could be used for any number of things. The giant wall was made for, you guessed it, a map with a giant wall and gate in it, but I've found its quite useful for large scale maps like fortresses, or the included gladiator pit. And don't forget to drop in deep shadows over any unused sections of flooring/walls that may overhang on your map!

25dcharacterpiecesvol1.description_text: This first volume of PVGames character pieces provides you with a number of pieces of equipment, clothing, hair styles, and other items to equip your characters with! You can freely mix and match the various pieces to create an exponential number of characters; and since each piece of clothing is its own separate graphic, you can easily re-color and edit pieces to fit your needs. All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

animationsselect_water.description_text: "Animations Select - Water" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. If you've been searching for ways to empower your sea-dwelling creatures or water-harnessing mages, look no further!

rpgbattlers2nd50monsters.description_text: Tyler Warren is back with 50 more colorful characters created in the spirit and style of classic RPGs! Created in the spirit of early console RPGs, this pack of 50 battlers by artist Tyler Warren brings 50 more fresh options to the professional and amateur game creator. Carefully crafted in a style comparable to the immensely popular Dragon Quest (Dragon Warrior) series, this set features monsters ranging from cute to colossal. Trolls, bugs, slimes, elementals, beasts, animals, flyers, and many others. Adaptable to any game making software, and specifically applicable to RPG Maker software.

tylerwarrenrpgbattlers_8littlemonstersan.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 6
tylerwarrenrpgbattlers_8littlemonstersan.description_text: Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 6 of 10. Previously Tyler's packs were release in sets of 50, but to help get monsters into the hands of creatives faster, he's releasing these smaller packs. When complete, there will be 10 packs in this set (80 total monsters).

animationsselect_thunder.description_text: "Animations Select - Thunder" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Shock and awe your audience by captivating them with these crackling visuals!

evfxshoot.description_text: "EVFX Shoot" features 20 gorgeous visual effects AND complementary sound effects, allowing you to add that professional polish to your projects easier than ever before and awe your audience!

visustellaatelier_herbsandspices_vol1.human_name: VisuStella Atelier: Herbs and Spices Vol. 1
visustellaatelier_herbsandspices_vol1.description_text: Hey kid you want some goods? We got some goods... *opens coat* Do your heroes need some ingredients to concoct the ultimate panacea? Maybe your survival horror RPG can make use of LOTS of herbs? Does your laboratory, restaurant or shop inspired games need some wares? Are you tired of tiny item images and want to make your game stand out? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines like RPG Maker aren't enough, so let us help you out with our atelier!

visustellaatelier_herbsandspices_vol2.human_name: VisuStella Atelier: Herbs and Spices Vol. 2
visustellaatelier_herbsandspices_vol2.description_text: Hey kid you want some goods? We got some goods... *opens coat* Do your heroes need some ingredients to concoct the ultimate panacea? Maybe your survival horror RPG can make use of LOTS of herbs? Does your laboratory, restaurant or shop inspired games need some wares? Are you tired of tiny item images and want to make your game stand out? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines like RPG Maker aren't enough, so let us help you out with our atelier!

25dnaturepackvol1.description_text: This first volume of 2.5D Nature Tiles provides you with numerous trees, ground tiles, flowers, rocks, cliffs, river banks, and much more to bring your outdoor settings to life! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

isometricdungeondesigneroutdoor.description_text: With the Isometric Dungeon Designer OUTDOOR EDITION, you can create giant grassy field, a gnarled forest, dilapidated ruins, a creepy graveyard, or the outside of a giant cathedral; whatever your isometric game needs. Load the pieces into your favorite image-editing tool with robust layer support (I recommend photoshop), and start building! Comes with 4 pre-made maps for you to use, or experiment with by placing new objects on the 'build-your-own' maps. Maps - Crossroads - Dappled light day and rainy night Graveyard - Nighttime Cathedral - Twilight All also come in build-your-own variations

moderndaymassivemusicpack.description_text: This fulsome fusillade of modern music from composer Joel Steudler has your game covered with a huge variety of tracks. You'll find fast paced, hard hitting metal and electronica. Then you'll find slow, soft, romantic tracks and peacefully paced background music. THEN you'll find retro themes recalling legends of the synth age. You will find even more than that; there are so many tracks! Really, it is a lot of music.

northfolk_icons.description_text: Prepare for your northern journey with this set of Icons! From barrels and bowls to swords and axes, from tools to longships, this icon set provides you what you need for your saga. This asset pack contains over 100 icons to fulfill your UI, inventory, equipment, and other needs! These icons largely correspond with the equipment found in the Northfolk Character Creator Kits as well as the Northfolk Tilesets. All icons are oversized at 512x512.

fantasybeastsmonsterpack.description_text: Twenty-five Fantasy Beasts for your heroes to battle in your isometric or sideview game! Set includes: Assassin, cultist, dark reaper, dark elf, frogman, ghost, giant spider, gnoll, goblin, guard, hobgoblin, golem/elemental (ice, fire, stone), imp, lizard man, ogre, ruffian, scout, skeleton, slime, swashbuckler, troll, wererat, and zombie! Also includes 3 bonus hero tokens: Warrior, Mage and Ranger; or whatever you want to use them as!

nightmaresmusicpack_vol2.description_text: Nightmares Vol. 2 continues the chilling legacy of its predecessor, diving even deeper into the abyss. This horror-inspired music pack delivers haunting soundscapes that conjure fear, suspense, and tension in every note. Each piece moves effortlessly between eerie calm and pulse-racing terror, perfect for bringing dark visions to life. Designed for game developers, filmmakers, and creators, these tracks capture the unsettling energy of twisted dreams and creeping dread. Whether for a mysterious cutscene, a haunted environment, or a frantic escape sequence, this collection provides the perfect atmosphere.

nightmaresmusicpack_vol3.description_text: Nightmares Vol. 3 pushes the boundaries of fear and atmosphere. This collection of 20 tracks captures the creeping dread, uneasy anticipation, and heart-pounding terror perfect for horror-based projects. Each composition evolves from slow-building tension into frantic crescendos, designed to unsettle, disturb, and mesmerize. Whether you’re scoring a psychological thriller, an eerie exploration game, or a haunting cinematic scene, this pack delivers a powerful emotional punch.

nightmaresmusicpack_vol4.description_text: Immerse your audience in pure shadow with Nightmares Vol. 4, a music pack crafted to envelop your projects in intense darkness and chilling atmosphere. Each of the 20 tracks brings a unique blend of gothic, sci-fi, and horror elements—perfect for settings that demand unease, suspense, or otherworldly dread. From subtle haunting melodies to full-force, spine-tingling horror, this collection balances terrifying intensity with a dreamlike, nightmarish flow. Every theme is meticulously designed to heighten tension and evoke the uncanny, making it ideal for haunted environments, sinister encounters, and spectral journeys.

rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots4.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 4
rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots4.description_text: Tyler Warren adds more 8 little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 4 of 10. Previously Tyler's packs were release in sets of 50, but to help get monsters into the hands of creatives faster, he's releasing these smaller packs at a much lower price point. When complete, there will be 10 packs in this set (80 total monsters).

animationsselect_ice.description_text: "Animations Select - Ice" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Harness the power of Ice to freeze and shatter your foes!

animationsselect_light.description_text: "Animations Select - Light" features 10 stunning effect animations revolving around the pack's theme. Dazzle your audience and let them see their champions' might in a new light!

rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots7.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 7
rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots7.description_text: The ooze is...evolving! Tyler Warren adds 8 more little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 7 of 10.

rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots2.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 2
rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots2.description_text: Tyler Warren adds 8 little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 2 of 10. Previously Tyler's packs were release in sets of 50, but to help get monsters into the hands of creatives faster, he's releasing these smaller packs at a much lower price point. When complete, there will be 10 packs in this set (80 total monsters).

rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots3.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 3
rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots3.description_text: Tyler Warren adds more 8 little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 3 of 10. Previously Tyler's packs were release in sets of 50, but to help get monsters into the hands of creatives faster, he's releasing these smaller packs at a much lower price point. When complete, there will be 10 packs in this set (80 total monsters).

medieval_bosses.description_text: You cannot expect to traverse the lengths of a fear-inducing dungeon without encountering a boss monster! This pack contains eight unique, oversized monsters, including sprite sheets for movement, down poses, animated side-view battlers, oversized static front-view battler, faces, busts, and more. These creatures are huge and will surely pose as massive obstacles for your players to overcome!

25dmedievalbuildingsvol1.description_text: This first volume of 2.5D Medieval Building Tiles provides you with a large number of building pieces to allow you to construct brick, stone, wooden, and fieldstone buildings! They are modular and can be completely mixed and matched; they also come in a large variety of shapes that you can snap together on a map like building blocks! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!
