grandadventuremusicpack.description_text: Whether you’re raiding lost arks or exploring doomed temples, this pack of twenty four background music tracks by composer Joel Steudler has you covered! Rousing orchestral themes and haunting native flutes set the stage for a jungle journey, while thirty Music Events and forty Sound Effects color the audio environment. Don’t forget your mosquito nets!

2point5dsnowandice.description_text:
Feel the chill breeze blow across the northern tundra! This set of tile assets will let you build snow-filled environments, ice-filled caverns, and more! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

Feel the chill breeze blow across the northern tundra! This set of tile assets will let you build snow-filled environments, ice-filled caverns, and more! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots9.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 9
rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots9.description_text: Little pink and purple things creeping around! Tyler Warren adds 8 more little monsters to your collection! Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 9 of 10.

medievalunderdeep.description_text: The drumming, the drumming in the Deep… Far below the surface dwell creatures of twisted visage and vile hearts. They have thrived in the darkness, and for centuries have amassed their numbers. Now, they march for the surface… Orcs, trolls, ettins, even a mighty dragon await you in the Underdeep! But that is not all, for both the Drow and Dwarves also live deep within the earth. Tiles, monsters, and three races of characters all themed around caverns will allow you to build complex dungeons for your players to explore and gain riches! When combined with other PVGames assets (namely Medieval: Dungeons), the possibilities grow exponentially.

tinytales_tower2drpgtilesetassetpack.human_name: Tiny Tales: Tower 2D RPG Tileset Asset Pack
tinytales_tower2drpgtilesetassetpack.description_text: Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: Tower Tiles, we present you with an ancient magical tower dungeon!

rpgbattlers_lostlevels.description_text:
Creatures, backgrounds, swords, scary scenes, and so much more await you in the this hodge podge collection of assets created by Tyler Warren that never saw the light of day. This is a wonderful collection of misfits, ready to use in your next game project.

This pack contains - 19 New battlers with matching facesets - 12 Fantastic sword designs - 1 Battleback (credit Zak Jones) and optional background overlay - 1 Coloring book page (ready to print and color) - 3 Characters - 1 Wallpaper background - 1 Monster in the Jungle Scene - Files formatted for easy Plug and Play into RPG Maker - All battlers are presented in sizes ranging from large to small - Each battler is also provided in an optional “soft-filtered” version

25dmonsters_daemonuminfernum.description_text: The set of monsters contains numerous Daemons for your hellish needs! Small Daemons, large Daemons, winged Daemons, wingless Daemons, even a Daemon hound! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

isometricdungeondesignermegamappack.human_name: Isometric Dungeon Designer - MEGA MAP PACK
isometricdungeondesignermegamappack.description_text: This MEGA collection of maps was created with the Isometric Dungeon Designer tools (and photoshop), and now they can all be yours! Maps range from Outdoor roads and small towns, to dark caves, to demonic fortresses. This is all the creator made maps in one place! This amazing pack also includes the Doodads in the base Isometric Dungeon Designer, and over 20 maps for you to modify yourself. These BYO maps are ready to have doodads dropped right on them for whatever you'd like to do!

retromusicpack.description_text: Retro Music pack is a collection of 25 music themes and sound effects you can use to bring a touch of retro to your games. Inspired by classic chip-tunes from what many players consider the golden age of gaming, this exciting pack is filled with sounds that will get your feet tapping. Composed by JDB Artist, the Retro Music Pack is a valuable tool in recreating that classic game atmosphere.

madnessmusicpack.description_text: Are you on the lookout for something intense and tinged with evil? Madness Music Pack is composed with darkness in mind. Its melodic themes are perfect for boss fights, unsettling encounters and soul-shattering revelations. This unique pack is a fantastic addition to your ever-growing music library.

2point5dscorchingsands.description_text: Scorching sands and blistering heat! This set of tile assets will let you build deserts, desert caves, cliffs, even sandstone structures! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

visustellaworlds_urbancity_vol1.description_text: The bustling streets of a downtown city are alive; the people, the traffic, the lights, and now you can create that too with VisuStella: Urban City! Featuring a vast array of city tiles including supermarkets, brick apartments, road signs and markings, animated vehicles, shop fronts and so much more, the only limit to the city you can create is your imagination. Compatible with all other VisuStella tiles, these will make a wonderful starting point or expansion to your collection.

visustellaworlds_urbancity_vol2.description_text: Build a wide variety of transit systems, from above ground train and tram stations to below ground subways, get your players where they need to go with style and pizzazz! These beautiful high-res pixel art tiles are the perfect marriage of high-resolution pixels and no compromise on detail and quality. Compatible with all other VisuStella releases, these tiles make a great starting point or a fantastic addition to other VisuStella sets.

evfxblast.description_text: "EVFX Blast" features 20 gorgeous visual effects AND complementary sound effects, allowing you to add that professional polish to your projects easier than ever before and awe your audience!

tinytales_charactergenex.description_text: Tiny Tales: Character Generator EX is the ultimate RPG character creation tool for the Tiny Tales brand. Combining battlers, sprites, and portraits, it’s your all-in-one solution for crafting 16-bit style characters. Features - All-in-One Creation: Craft battlers, portraits, and sprites effortlessly for a seamless start to your game design. - Customizable: Import your own grayscale pieces for full creative control.* - Diverse Options: Choose from a wide range of body types, skin tones, hairstyles, clothing, and accessories. - Vibrant Colors: Access over 132 handpicked color tones to keep your pixel art consistent and eye-catching. - Expression Variety: Export characters with a full set of 8 distinct facial expressions, adding depth to your character designs. - Efficient Exporting: Generate multiple assets at once or fine-tune them individually. - Real-Time Preview: Instantly see your creations come to life as you design. *Grayscale custom pieces must match the sprite size for proper rendering. Details in the user manual.

cybercitymusicpack_vol02.description_text: Jack into twenty tracks of glitchy teched out action and intrigue from composer Joel Steudler. The seedy undersides of dystopian cyberstructures sound cold and menacing, but the music of this matrix is anything but artificial.

medievalexpansion.description_text: Hundreds of buildings, trees, and items all at your fingertips to make parallax maps easier and higher-quality! Buildings, trees, and objects from some of the other Medieval resource packs have been completely re-made in higher quality, along with numerous brand-new houses, buildings, and trees to supplement your resource stash! With these resources, you can very quickly build your own parallax maps effectively. These new and remastered tiles are compatible with all other Medieval resource packs.

tinytalescodearkbattlers_vol2_swarminvas.human_name: Tiny Tales Code Ark Battlers Vol.2: Swarm Invasion
tinytalescodearkbattlers_vol2_swarminvas.description_text: Tiny Tales Code Ark is designed for those who are looking to add a futuristic, epic touch to their game. In CA: Swarm Invasion, you will find several unique and expertly crafted pixel monsters for your game! Featuring a wide selection of alien bugs, giant insects and epic sized swarm leaders for boss fights, this pack is sure to add additional flair to your game!

cybercitymusicpack_vol01.description_text: This pack of twenty tracks jacks in the sounds of soaring synths, heavy guitars, electronic beats and otherworldly textures to fill up your futuristic games. Whether you're dreaming of electric sheep or tackling terminators, composer Joel Steudler has you covered. Also includes fifteen Music Events for short dramatic moments!

25dmedievalbuildings_vol2.description_text: This second volume of 2.5D Medieval Building Tiles provides you with a large number of building pieces to allow you to plaster, log cabin, wooden, and fieldstone buildings! They are modular and can be completely mixed and matched; they also come in a large variety of shapes that you can snap together on a map like building blocks! All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

galefirerpgcharactersnpcpack2_thecrew.description_text: The GalefireRPG Characters NPC pack 2 contains 9 characters to use in your isometric/virtual tabletop, sideview, or visual novel game (such as RPGmaker). Includes the crew of the Quicksilver from The Legendary Captain Slayde comic series! (and yes, I'm working on a 77 page book right now!) Use them to go on awesome Galefire adventures (RPG book coming soon) or just use them as NPCs for whatever game you're planning! Included: Slayde - The Legendary Captain, Doom - Slayer, Nara - Thief/Ninja, Mal - "Cleric", Doctor Boom 'Doc' - Explosive Engineer, Sam - Sage, Alise - Cyber Pilot, Red - Golden Dragon Chef, Boom Bot "BB" - Salvaged War Construct. All ready to use in .png format Cover demons are not included, but you can find them here: Hellish Demons Pack

2point5dcharacterpieces_worldwar2.description_text: This fourth volume of PVGames character pieces provides you with a number of pieces of equipment, clothing, hair styles, and other items to equip your characters with! This pack contains outfits and equipment for World War II-themed characters, from American airborne and British commandos to German infantry and Stormtroopers. These are historical outfits for your characters. You can freely mix and match the various pieces to create an exponential number of characters; and since each piece of clothing is its own separate graphic, you can easily re-color and edit pieces to fit your needs. All PVGames 2.5D resources are designed to be modular and interchangeable with one another, so that you can collect and expand upon your library for exponential possibilities!

tylerwarrenrpgbattlers_pixel-style3.description_text: In response to many requests for more retro-pixel graphics needed by game makers, Tyler Warren has completely remastered his monster collection in this the 3rd of 3 pixel-style graphic packs. This pack is a careful assortment of 93 of Tyler’s battlers recreated in a pixel art style, presented in 9 different color palettes and 4 sizes, for an impressive total of 3,348 graphic image files in one pack. If you’re working on your retro or pixel game these are the monsters you need!

tylerwarrenrpgbattlers_pixel-style2.description_text: In response to many requests for more retro-pixel graphics needed by game makers, Tyler Warren has completely remastered his monster collection in this the 2nd of 3 pixel-style graphic packs. This pack is a careful assortment of 94 of Tyler’s battlers recreated in a pixel art style, presented in 9 different color palettes and 4 sizes, for an impressive total of 3,384 graphic image files in one pack. If you’re working on your retro or pixel game these are the monsters you need!

animationscollection2_quantum.description_text: Inspired by the themes of space and time, Animations Collection II: Quantum offers a unique set of dynamic, easy-to-implement special effects designed to enrich the variation of your characters’ arsenal and impress your players.

classicaladventuremusicpack.description_text: Step into a world of timeless fantasy with Classical Adventure, a rich collection of tracks inspired by the golden age of role-playing games. From sweeping overworld themes to tense dungeon scores, this pack captures the spirit of adventure that defined classic RPGs. Composed by JDB Artist, Classical Adventure includes 25 BGM tracks covering battles, dungeons, towns, and more—alongside 14 thematic background sounds and 13 musical effects (MEs) for victories, fanfares, and defeats. Delivered in multiple high-bitrate formats, this pack is a must-have for creators seeking that authentic, nostalgic RPG atmosphere.

sc_monsterpack1.description_text: Boasting a very generous amount of fantasy creatures, there's many perils to be found within this world of fantasy. From slimes, scorpions and rats, to angelic spirits and twisted creatures, there's an entire world of creatures to endanger your heroes in here! Whether you're on a lookout for a new enemy rotation or need an inspiration boost for constructing your game's lore, Seraph Circle Monster Pack 1 is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG resources.

sc_monsterpack3.description_text: The third installment in this series of monster packs brings you back into the twisted, but colorful, world of SeraphCircle! From cute onion dancers to painfully monstrous abominations, this pack is a rich collection of perils ready to decimate your heroes and tell a story while at it.

sc_monsterpack2.description_text: The continuation to the SeraphCircle series of monster packs, here you will find 20 vibrant creatures explored in several variants for your game! From cutesy nut eaters to the ravenous undead, these creatures mastered the elements to burn the unprepared party to a crisp. Or freeze them. Or maybe summon demons, you pick! Whether you're on a lookout for a new enemy rotation or need an inspiration boost for constructing your game's lore, Seraph Circle Monster Pack 2 is a fantastic addition to your growing library of RPG resources.

visustellaatelier_potionsandtonics_vol2.human_name: VisuStella Atelier: Potions and Tonics Vol. 2
visustellaatelier_potionsandtonics_vol2.description_text: Do you need some potions to survive the dangerous world? Do you need some materials for your latest synthesis? Do you need more concoctions for your latest experiments? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines like aren't enough; So let us help you out with our atelier!

visustellaatelier_potionsandtonics_vol1.human_name: VisuStella Atelier: Potions and Tonics Vol. 1
visustellaatelier_potionsandtonics_vol1.description_text: Do you need some potions to survive the dangerous world? Do you need some materials for your latest synthesis? Do you need more concoctions for your latest experiments? Do you need some sweet UI elements, Event CG and Pictures to spruce up your game? The small icons included in most game engines like aren't enough; So let us help you out with our atelier!

cursedkingdoms_bosspack.description_text: The Cursed Kingdom expands with the BOSS pack... herein are seven dark fantasy beasts for your heroes to battle in your isometric (or popular virtual tabletop systems), sideview game (such as RPGmaker MV), or VN game! Check out the whole Cursed Kingdoms set here: Demonic Berserker, Enslaver Headhunter, Lich-touched Undead, Osidian Lich Lord, Sea Terror, Swarm Exploder, and Umbral Terror.

storytellersmusicpack.description_text: Elevate your story to new heights of emotion with these twenty tracks from composer Joel Steudler! This is music orchestrated to recall the sounds of the great anime and visual novel romance series... a fresh take on nostalgic favorite styles! Also includes twenty Music Events for impactful transitions between scenes.

evfxsanctuary.description_text: EVFX Sanctuary features 20 gorgeous visual effects AND complementary sound effects, allowing you to add that professional polish to your projects easier than ever before and awe your audience!

rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots5.human_name: RPG Battlers - Little Monsters and Robots 5
rpgbattlers_littlemonstersandrobots5.description_text: Tyler Warren is working on a new line of original monsters and this is set 5 of 10. Previously Tyler's packs were release in sets of 50, but to help get monsters into the hands of creatives faster, he's releasing these smaller packs. When complete, there will be 10 packs in this set (80 total monsters).

tinytalescodeark_uiassets.human_name: Tiny Tales Code Ark: UI Assets
tinytalescodeark_uiassets.description_text: Tiny Tales Code Ark is designed for those who are looking to add a futuristic, epic touch to their game. In CA: UI Assets, we bring you a selection of UI elements, buttons and skins with stylish futuristic themes to enhance the visuals of your game!

rpgbattlers_7th50monsters.description_text: Tyler Warren’s 7th set of 50 graphic assets is designed to maximize the usefulness of your Time Fantasy collection. This tribute, which is primarily based on art from two Time Fantasy packs (Monsters, and Mythical Monsters), gives you exponentially more options for your project. Use these graphics for detailed cut scenes, battles, story development, dialog, titles and much more. Use this pack to bridge styles and open up your project to a pool of 400+ monsters from Tyler Warren’s growing library of monsters while adding the prefect compliment to your Time Fantasy assets.

medievaldungeons.description_text: Encompassed by a darkness so thick that your torch light cannot penetrate it, are you brave enough to venture deeper into the depths of the Dungeon? No adventure is complete without a perilous dungeon, and no dungeon is complete without monstrous horrors to face! This pack contains two dozen monsters (including sprite sheets for movement, down poses, animated side-view battlers, over-sized static front-view battler, faces, busts, and more), tons of tiles for dungeon creation (and can be freely mixed and matched with all other Medieval tiles), numerous animated objects from doors and gates to light sources and magic orbs, and several ready-to-use prisoners to occupy the lowest cells within your dungeon.

tinytales_dungeons2dtilesetassetpack.human_name: Tiny Tales: Dungeons 2D Tileset Asset Pack
tinytales_dungeons2dtilesetassetpack.description_text: Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: Dungeons, we cover castles, fortresses, mines and hi-tech facilities!

tinytalescodearkbattlers_vol1_galaxyfron.human_name: Tiny Tales Code Ark Battlers Vol.1: Galaxy Frontiers
tinytalescodearkbattlers_vol1_galaxyfron.description_text: Tiny Tales Code Ark is designed for those who are looking to add a futuristic, epic touch to their game. In CA: Galaxy Frontiers, you will find several unique and expertly crafted pixel monsters for your game! Featuring a wide selection of futuristic robots, alien monsters and space pirates, this pack is sure to add additional flair to your game!

jdrf.description_text:
Donations to support Breakthrough T1D are made to PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

As the leading global type 1 diabetes research and advocacy organization, we help make everyday life better while driving toward cures. We are opening doors that were once closed by T1D diagnosis. We lead the way to more effective solutions by connecting the brightest minds to advance treatments, influence policy, and improve access to care.​ By driving innovation forward, we will make T1D a thing of the past.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Game Creator Mega Bundle Vol. 2
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get EVFX Blast, EVFX Shoot, Retro Music Pack, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Want to build your own RPG with unique environments and exciting characters but just have no clue where to start? Find what you need in this Mega Bundle full of detailed, high-quality assets for games of every genre–everything from tilesets to build your perfect cursed school, map packs to design the dreariest dungeon, character generators for all your sprites, battlers, and faces, and music for every big moment and setting, from your darkest nightmares to your seediest cyber bars. Get over 100 asset packs to bring your game to life in Unreal Engine and Unity, and support Type 1 diabetes charity Breakthrough T1D with your purchase at the price of your choosing!
from_bundle.author: Publishers

basic_data.human_name: Humble Tech Book Bundle: Software Architecture by Pearson
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: A software system is only as good as its architecture—all of the building blocks that make the system work—allows it to function. In order to build better software, you’ll need to understand the fundamentals of how everything fits together, and that’s where this handy ebook bundle of textbooks from Pearson comes in. Learn the importance of coupling in everyday software architecture, how to make your software shift and flow depending on the needs of the system, how to use the fundamentals of software architecture to build your software more efficiently, and much more in this 19-book library. Get a foothold on the basics so that your future projects are foolproof. Every purchase at the price of your choice supports Code.org, ensuring every student has access to computer science.
basic_data.description:
Discover how everything fits together. A software system is only as good as its architecture—all of the building blocks that make the system work—allows it to function. In order to build better software, you’ll need to understand the fundamentals of how everything fits together, and that’s where this handy ebook bundle of textbooks from Pearson comes in. Learn the importance of coupling in everyday software architecture, how to make your software shift and flow depending on the needs of the system, how to use the fundamentals of software architecture to build your software more efficiently, and much more in this 19-book library. Get a foothold on the basics so that your future projects are foolproof. Every purchase at the price of your choice supports Code.org, ensuring every student has access to computer science.

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $812. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF format, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publisher and to support Code.org. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

patternsforapidesign.description_text:
This practical guide cuts through the complexity of API conversations and their message contents, introducing comprehensive guidelines and heuristics for designing APIs sustainably and specifying them clearly, for whatever technologies or platforms you use. Learn the entire API lifecycle, from launching projects and establishing goals through defining requirements, elaborating designs, planning evolution, and creating useful documentation.

  • Identify and overcome API design challenges with patterns
  • Design request and response messages and their representations
  • Refine your message design for quality
  • Plan to evolve your APIs
  • Document and communicate your API contracts
  • Combine patterns to solve real-world problems and make the right tradeoffs

continuousarchitectureinpractice.description_text:
Update your architectural practices for new challenges, environments, and stakeholder expectations

Continuous Architecture in Practice provides hands-on advice for leveraging the continuous architecture approach in real-world environments and illuminates architecture's changing role in the age of Agile, DevOps, and cloud platforms. This guide will help technologists update their architecture practice for new software challenges.

It includes in-depth guidance for addressing today's key quality attributes and cross-cutting concerns such as security, performance, scalability, resilience, data, and emerging technologies. Each key technique is demonstrated through a start-to-finish case study reflecting the authors' deep experience with complex software environments.

understandingsoftwaredynamics.description_text:
An Expert Guide to Software Performance Optimization

From mobile and cloud apps to video games to driverless vehicle control, more and more software is time-constrained: It must deliver reliable results seamlessly, consistently, and virtually instantaneously. If it doesn't, customers are unhappy--and sometimes lives are put at risk. When complex software underperforms or fails, software engineers need to identify and address the root causes. This is difficult and, historically, few tools have been available to help.

Software performance expert Richard L. Sites tackles the problem head on, offering expert methods and advanced tools for understanding complex, time-constrained software dynamics, improving reliability and troubleshooting challenging performance problems.

async-firstplaybook.description_text:
Reimagining Agile for Distributed and Remote Teams

Distributed work is now inevitable, but conventional agile approaches are too "synchronous" for today's remote teams. Meetings, ceremonies, and rituals can become unsustainable when teams are scattered across the globe. The result: burnout, constant interruptions, a lack of deep work, poor work-life balance, greater frustration, and workplaces with poor diversity.

In The Async-First Playbook, Thoughtworks Principal Product Manager Sumeet Gayathri Moghe provides tools and techniques to embed remote-native, asynchronous practices into traditional agile methods, making remote work more efficient, inclusive, thoughtful, and fun.

effectivesoftwarearchitecture.description_text: Build better software—faster. This essential guide empowers teams to make architecture a repeatable, strategic advantage. Oliver Goldman delivers real-world practices for decision-making, communication, and design that scale across releases. Whether you're an architect, PM, or designer, this book helps you align teams, manage change, and deliver great products consistently.

practicalobject-orienteddesign2ande.description_text:
The Complete Guide to Writing Maintainable, Manageable, and Powerful Object-Oriented Applications

Object-oriented programming languages exist to help you create beautiful, straightforward applications that are easy to change and simple to extend. Unfortunately, the world is awash with object-oriented (OO) applications that are difficult to understand and expensive to change. This book teaches you powerful, real-world, object-oriented design techniques with simple and practical examples.

Whatever your previous object-oriented experience, this concise guide will help you achieve the superior outcomes you’re looking for.

code_org.description_text:
Donations to support Code.org are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Launched in 2013, Code.org® is a non-profit dedicated to expanding participation in computer science by making it available in more schools, and increasing participation by women and underrepresented students of color. Code.org's comprehensive approach represents the vanguard of effective integration of Computer Science (CS) into the core of public school education. Our vision is that every student in every school should have the opportunity to learn computer science. We believe computer science and computer programming should be part of the core curriculum in education, alongside other science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) courses, such as biology, physics, chemistry and algebra.

softwarearchitectureanddecision-making.description_text: Build better systems by mastering the art of architectural judgment. This book equips technical leaders with five key questions and seven principles to navigate uncertainty, balance trade-offs, and align technology, UX, and product strategy. A must-read for architects and decision-makers shaping resilient, high-impact software.

architectureforflow.description_text: Master adaptive systems that thrive amid change. This book unites strategy, architecture, and team design to unlock continuous value delivery. Using Wardley Mapping, DDD, and Team Topologies, Kaiser equips you to anticipate disruption, reduce bottlenecks, and evolve resilient socio-technical systems. A must-read for leaders building future-ready organizations.

strategicmonolithsandmicroservices.description_text:
Learn how to make balanced architectural decisions based on need and purpose, rather than hype, so you can promote value and innovation, deliver more evolvable systems, and avoid costly mistakes. Using realistic examples, the authors show how to construct well-designed monoliths that are maintainable and extensible, and how to gradually redesign and reimplement even the most tangled legacy systems into truly effective microservices.

  • Compare architectural styles that can lead to versatile, adaptable applications and services
  • Recognize when monoliths are your best option and how best to architect, design, and implement them
  • Learn when to move monoliths to microservices and how to do it, whether they're modularized or a "Big Ball of Mud"

softwarearchitectureinpractice4ande.description_text: Master the art of building scalable, resilient systems with this definitive guide to software architecture. Updated with chapters on cloud, DevOps, quantum computing, and energy efficiency, it shows how to design, analyze, and evolve architectures that drive business value. Learn proven patterns, optimize quality attributes, and transform architecture into a strategic asset.

rightingsoftware.description_text:
Righting Software presents the proven, structured approach to software design that Juval Löwy has practiced and taught around the world. Löwy describes the primary area where many software architects fail and shows how to break a system into smaller building blocks or services. Next, he shows how to flow an effective project design from the system design; how to accurately calculate the project duration, cost, and risk; and how to devise multiple execution options.

The method and principles shown apply regardless of your project and company size, technology, platform, or industry. Löwy addresses the critical challenges of software development today by righting software systems and projects. Software professionals at any stage of their career will benefit greatly from this book.

domainstorytelling.description_text:
Storytelling is at the heart of human communication--why not use it to overcome costly misunderstandings when designing software? By telling and visualizing stories, domain experts and team members make business processes and domain knowledge tangible. With this guide, the inventors of domain storytelling explain how teams can work together to capture insights with simple pictographs, show their work, solicit feedback, and get everyone on the same page.

Stefan Hofer and Henning Schwentner introduce the method's easy pictographic language, scenario-based modeling techniques, workshop format, and relationship to other modeling methods. Using step-by-step case studies, they guide you through solving many common problems of software design.

balancingcouplinginsoftwaredesign.description_text: Discover a powerful framework for building modular, low-complexity systems. Vlad Khononov redefines coupling as a design tool, offering a unified metric and practical strategies to balance dependencies. Learn how to evolve software architectures with clarity, adaptability, and purpose—essential reading for modern software engineers.

softwarerequirementsessentials.description_text:
20 Best Practices for Developing and Managing Requirements on Any Project

Software Requirements Essentials presents core practices for successful requirements planning. The authors focus on the practices most likely to deliver superior value for both traditional and agile projects. Concise and tightly focused, this book offers just enough pragmatic "how-to" detail for you to apply the core practices with confidence, whether you're a business analyst, requirements engineer, product manager, product owner, or developer. Using it, your entire team can build a shared understanding of key concepts, terminology, techniques, and rationales--and work together more effectively on every project.

domain-drivendesigndistilled.description_text:
Domain-Driven Design (DDD) software modeling delivers powerful results in practice, not just in theory, which is why developers worldwide are rapidly moving to adopt it. This accessible guide to the basics of DDD explains clearly what it is, what problems it solves, how it works, and how to gain value from it.

The book guides you through each core DDD technique for building better software. You’ll learn how to segregate domain models using the powerful Bounded Contexts pattern, to develop a Ubiquitous Language within an explicitly bounded context, and to help domain experts and developers work together to create that language. Vernon shows how to use Subdomains to handle legacy systems and to integrate multiple Bounded Contexts to define both team relationships and technical mechanisms.

principlesofwebapidesign.description_text:
Principles of Web API Design brings together principles and processes to help you succeed across the entire API design lifecycle. Walk through a real-world example from the ground up.

  • Deliver great APIs by getting your design processes right
  • Gain agreement on specific outcomes from design teams, customers, and other stakeholders
  • Craft job stories, conduct EventStorming, and model capabilities
  • Identify the right APIs, and organize operations into coherent API profiles
  • Choose the best styles for each project: REST, gRPC, GraphQL, or event-based async APIs
  • Refine designs based on feedback from documenters, testers, and customers
  • Decompose APIs into microservices
  • Mature your API program, implementing design and management processes that scale

functionalandconcurrentprogramming.description_text: In Functional and Concurrent Programming, Michel Charpentier introduces a core set of programming language constructs that will help you be productive in a variety of programming languages—now and in the future. Charpentier illustrates key concepts with numerous small, focused code examples, and with case studies that provide a thorough grounding in functional and concurrent programming skills. These skills will carry from language to language—including the most recent incarnations of Java. Using these features will enable developers and programmers to write high-quality code that is easier to understand, debug, optimize, and evolve.

modernsoftwareengineering.description_text:
In Modern Software Engineering, continuous delivery pioneer David Farley helps software professionals think about their work more effectively, manage it more successfully, and genuinely improve the quality of their applications, their lives, and the lives of their colleagues.

Writing for programmers, managers, and technical leads at all levels of experience, Farley illuminates durable principles at the heart of effective software development. He distills the discipline into two core exercises: learning and exploration and managing complexity. For each, he defines principles that can help you improve everything from your mindset to the quality of your code, and describes approaches proven to promote success.

serverlessasagamechanger.description_text:
Leverage the “serverless mindset” to build and deploy software faster, better, and with less expense.

In this definitive guide, Joseph Emison shows how to leverage “serverless” for maximum customer value. He reveals why mindset is crucial to modern IT strategy and explains why and how to move toward a truly serverless mindset.

  • Evolve your tech stack and mindset to gain the full benefits of the cloud
  • Deliver software faster, better, and at lower cost with serverless
  • Use serverless architectures and managed services to offload tasks that don't add value
  • Follow a real-world case study taking you from where you are to where you want to be
  • Explore an exclusive managed services directory to find resources to streamline your serverless transition

code_org.description_text:
Donations to support Code.org are made to the PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.

Launched in 2013, Code.org® is a non-profit dedicated to expanding participation in computer science by making it available in more schools, and increasing participation by women and underrepresented students of color. Code.org's comprehensive approach represents the vanguard of effective integration of Computer Science (CS) into the core of public school education. Our vision is that every student in every school should have the opportunity to learn computer science. We believe computer science and computer programming should be part of the core curriculum in education, alongside other science, technology, engineering, and mathematics (STEM) courses, such as biology, physics, chemistry and algebra.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Software Architecture by Pearson
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Righting Software, Domain Storytelling, Patterns for API Design, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: A software system is only as good as its architecture—all of the building blocks that make the system work—allows it to function. In order to build better software, you’ll need to understand the fundamentals of how everything fits together, and that’s where this handy ebook bundle of textbooks from Pearson comes in. Learn the importance of coupling in everyday software architecture, how to make your software shift and flow depending on the needs of the system, how to use the fundamentals of software architecture to build your software more efficiently, and much more in this 19-book library. Get a foothold on the basics so that your future projects are foolproof. Every purchase at the price of your choice supports Code.org, ensuring every student has access to computer science.
from_bundle.author: Pearson

basic_data.human_name: Humble Book Bundle: Math and Physics for Dummies 2025 ENCORE
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Need some help wrapping your head around complex subjects in math and physics? This bundle of books in the popular For Dummies series is here to help with fun and approachable lessons across a number of tricky topics! Statistics All-in-One For Dummies will teach you how to interpret graphs, determine probability, critique data and more! Bone up on the fundamentals and move onto the advanced stuff like graphing functions and approximating area with Calculus For Dummies. Thermodynamics For Dummies will help you wrap your head around complex concepts like entropy and the laws of thermodynamics in an easily digestible and approachable manner. Pay what you want for all these and more—a total of 16 books—and help support buildOn with your purchase!
basic_data.description:
Math, physics & more… For Dummies. Need some help wrapping your head around complex subjects in math and physics? This bundle of books in the popular For Dummies series is here to help with fun and approachable lessons across a number of tricky topics! Statistics All-in-One For Dummies will teach you how to interpret graphs, determine probability, critique data and more! Bone up on the fundamentals and move onto the advanced stuff like graphing functions and approximating area with Calculus For Dummies. Thermodynamics For Dummies will help you wrap your head around complex concepts like entropy and the laws of thermodynamics in an easily digestible and approachable manner. Pay what you want for all these and more—a total of 16 books—and help support buildOn with your purchase!

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the ebooks in this bundle is as much as $371. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase.

Read them anywhere. The ebooks in this bundle are available in PDF, PRC and ePub formats, so they work on your computer, e-readers, iPads, cell phones, and a wide array of mobile devices! Instructions and a list of recommended reading programs can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the publishers and to support buildOn. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

statisticsall-in-onefordummies.description_text:
Slay statistics the Dummies wayStatistics All-in-One For Dummies covers key statistical concepts and teaches students how to interpret graphs, determine probability, critique data, and so much more! Written by an expert author who lives and breathes statistics, Statistics AIO For Dummies explains everything in easy-to-understand terms. Lessons, examples, practice problems, and online quizzes give students plenty of opportunities to master the content with ease.  

Inside:

  • Stats, charts, and graphs
  • Understanding and critiquing polls
  • The Central Limit Theorem
  • Data analysis tools
  • Correlation and regression
  • Get one-year access to chapter quizzes online!

physicsi_501practiceproblemsfordummiespl.human_name: Physics I: 501 Practice Problems For Dummies (+ Free Online Practice)
physicsi_501practiceproblemsfordummiespl.description_text:
Previous edition: 9781118853153

Physics I: 501 Practice Problems For Dummies gives students hundreds of opportunities to solve problems from the major concepts introduced in a Physics I course. With the book, readers also get access to practice problems online, where they can create customized practice sets to suit their study needs.

algebraiiessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

geometryessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

algebraiessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

physicsifordummies3rdedition.description_text: Physics I For Dummies, 3rd Edition, explains the basic principles of physics in a simple, clear, and entertaining fashion. Designed to be a supplement to a course in Physics I, it includes information on the basics of physics, including motion; energy; waves (sound, light, wave-particle); solids, liquids, and gasses; thermodynamics; electromagnetism; relativity; atomic and nuclear structures; and the Big Bang theory and stars. For anyone who is looking for a supplement for a course or is simply curious to learn about physics, this updated edition of Physics I For Dummies is of great value! Inside this book youll gain a better understanding of: Measuring displacement Gravity and friction Turning energy into work Rotational motion Simple explanations of Newton's laws Fluids, flow, and pressure

mathforreallifefordummies.human_name: Math For Real Life For Dummies
mathforreallifefordummies.description_text: Math For Real Life For Dummies is for those readers looking for a reference to help them master the mathematics that they encounter in daily life. Not everyone retains the math they learned in school. Like any skill, your ability to work math problems can deteriorate if left unused. Math For Real Life For Dummies is a resource that readers can use to brush up on math skills or to handle everyday encounters from making sense of checkbooks and calculating restaurant tips to understanding interest rates and investments and calculating percentages and odds. Math For Real Life For Dummies uses real-world situations and examples to help readers take the stress out of their daily calculation encounters.

opticsfordummies.description_text: Tracking to a typical undergraduate optics course, Optics For Dummies will provide readers with an approachable introduction to optical science, methods, and applications. Concepts covered will include the nature of light and optical effects; reflection, refraction, and diffraction; color dispersion; optical devices, industrial, medical, and military applications (including optical data transmission); and laser light fundamentals.

physicsiifordummies.description_text:
Physics II For Dummies covers the essentials of an advanced physics course clearly and concisely.

It walks students through important key concepts including:
  • Mechanical Waves and Sound Forces and Fields
  • Electric Potential and Electric Energy Electric Current and Direct-Current Circuits
  • Magnetic Flux and Faraday's Law of Induction
  • Alternating Currents Electromagnetic Waves
  • Geometric Optics
  • Optical Instruments Interference and Diffraction Relativity
  • Atoms, Photons, and Electrons Molecules
  • Solids Nuclear and High-Energy Physics

physicsiworkbookfordummieswithonlineprac.human_name: Physics I Workbook For Dummies with Online Practice, 3rd Edition
physicsiworkbookfordummieswithonlineprac.description_text: Physics I Workbook For Dummies, 3rd Edition, focuses on all facets of physics, such as: Acceleration, distance, and time Circular motion Momentum and kinetic energy Rotational kinematics and rotational dynamics Potential and kinetic energy Thermodynamics Complete answer explanations are included for all problems so readers can see where they went wrong (or right). This edition comes with free 1-year access to chapter quizzes online.

calculus_1001practiceproblemsfordummiesp.human_name: Calculus: 1001 Practice Problems For Dummies (+ Free Online Practice)
calculus_1001practiceproblemsfordummiesp.description_text: Previous edition: 9781118496718 Every practice problem in Calculus: 1001 Practice Problems For Dummies includes a detailed answer explanation with a step-by-step solution and narrative walk-through. Readers get free access to all 1,001 practice problems online, where they can create their own study sets for focused learning. PINs are not printed in books. They are delivered electronically for both print and ebooks.

pre-calculusfordummies3rdedition.description_text: Pre-Calculus For Dummies, 3rd Edition caters to the needs of the increasing number of students taking pre-calculus courses in high school by providing the fundamental information in an unintimidating way. In addition, Pre-Calculus For Dummies, 3rd Edition includes updates such as fresh example equations, explanations and practical examples that mirror today's teaching methods, and relevant cultural vernacular and references.

trigonometryfordummies3rdedition.description_text: Trigonometry deals with the relationship between the sides and angles of triangles...mostly right triangles. In practical use, trigonometry is a friend to astronomers who use triangulation to measure the distance between stars. Trig also has applications in fields as broad as financial analysis, music theory, biology, medical imaging, cryptology, game development, and seismology. This new edition of Trigonometry For Dummies will track to a typical Trigonometry course at the high school or college level.

thermodynamicsfordummies.description_text:
Thermodynamics For Dummies tracks to a typical thermodynamics course offered at the undergraduate level and assists readers in understanding the fundamental concepts of the subject and helps to develop problem-solving skills through practice in solving energy-related problems.

Specific coverage includes:
  • General balance principle (open systems, closed systems, rate balances, increment balances)
  • Mass balances (specific volume, system mass, mass-flow rate)
  • Zeroth law (thermodynamic equilibrium and temperature)
  • First-law balances (internal energy, enthalpy)
  • Second-law balances (availability, entropy)
  • Cycles (Rankine, Brayton, vapor-compression)
  • Non-reacting mixtures of ideal gases
  • Reacting mixtures (mass balances, energy balances, heating values, standardized enthalpy)

calculusfordummies2ndedition.description_text:
Calculus can be a topic many students struggle with, especially those without a solid mathematic background. In the first edition of Calculus For Dummies, the groundwork was laid for those interested in this discipline.

This updated second edition includes:
  • Foundational review  of algebra, trigonometry, and pre-calculus concepts
  • Sequences and series
  • Common functions and how to graph them
  • Approximating area with integration
  • Explanations and practical examples that mirror todays teaching methods
  • Relevant cultural vernacular and references
  • Standard For Dummies materials that match the current standard and design

physicsessentialsfordummies.description_text: Positioned for students (and parents) who just want the key concepts and a few examples -- without the review, ramp-up, and anecdotal content -- The Essentials For Dummies series is a perfect solution for exam-cramming, homework help, and reference.

basic_data.human_name: Learn To Create Game Art in Blender 2025
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Start your next career as a game art designer with a little help from the Learn to Create Game Art in Blender 2025 Bundle! Learn the basics or polish your existing skill set with expert-led courses like The Blender Sculpting Brushes Course, The Complete Blender Creator Course, and The Blender Animation & Rigging Course. Discover how to export your work directly from Blender to Unity and Godot with ease! Save big on life-changing creative tools and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase.
basic_data.description:
Blender for beginners and beyond. Start your next career as a game art designer with a little help from the Learn to Create Game Art in Blender 2025 Bundle! Learn the basics or polish your existing skill set with expert-led courses like The Blender Sculpting Brushes Course, The Complete Blender Creator Course, and The Blender Animation & Rigging Course. Discover how to export your work directly from Blender to Unity and Godot with ease! Save big on life-changing creative tools and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase.

GameDev.tv has had the honour of helping more than 1 milion students on their game dev journey. Created in 2014, our mission is to help 'empower aspiring game developers to create and grow'. 

Pay $1 or more. Normally, the total cost for the software in this bundle is as much as $2,419. Here at Humble Bundle, you choose the price and increase your contribution to upgrade your bundle! This bundle has a minimum $1 purchase. Pay $1 or more to access keys.

Redeem your keys. The content in this bundle is redeemable on the Gamedev.tv website. Instructions can be found here.

Support charity. Choose where the money goes - between the developer and to support One Tree Planted. If you like what we do, you can leave us a Humble Tip too!

blenderproductcommercialscourse.description_text:
Dive into our Blender Product Commercials course and start creating eye-catching ads that pop!

Learn to model products, set up killer lighting, and create fluid simulations that make your commercials look epic.

We’ll guide you step-by-step through making a professional energy drink ad, complete with a sleek can, frosty condensation, and splashy impact effects.

Whether you’re new to Blender or levelling up your skills, this course has everything you need to create stunning 3D ads.

Don’t miss your chance to learn industry tricks and bring your creative visions to life. Join now and start making Blender magic happen!

isometricscenecoursenew.description_text:
Unlock your creativity with our Blender Isometric Scene Creation course!

Whether you're a beginner or looking to sharpen your skills, this course is your ultimate guide to crafting stunning 3D isometric scenes.

Learn essential Blender techniques, from modelling and using modifiers to advanced lighting and texturing hacks.

You'll master creating detailed dioramas, like a wizard's workshop, perfect for game environments or just to wow your friends.

With easy-to-follow lessons and insider tips, you'll speed up your workflow and level up your game design skills.

Get ready to create magical, immersive worlds and add impressive new pieces to your portfolio. Grab the bundle and start crafting today!

blendergameassets_spaceshipsnew.description_text:
Ready to take your game assets to the next level?

With Blender Game Assets: Modular Spaceships, you’ll learn to create jaw-dropping starships quickly and easily, using clever kitbashing techniques.

Say goodbye to hours lost in 3D modelling frustration and hello to a fun, creative workflow!

This course is perfect for game developers, concept artists, and illustrators looking to boost their skills.

You’ll build a library of reusable parts, texture like a pro, and maintain a consistent style across all your creations.

Whether you're a newbie or looking to sharpen your Blender skills, this course has everything you need to launch your very own spaceship fleet!

Grab the bundle and let your creativity blast off!

blenderdragonsculptingcourse.description_text:
Master sculpting by creating the coolest beast on the planet - a dragon.

Ready to make the mother of all Dragons? In this course, you'll create your own awesome dragon from start to finish.

The course is created at a "real time" pace, allowing you to follow along and create your dragon at the same time as the instructors without needing to stop and start the video. Nothing is skipped or speeded up, so you get to see the entire workflow.

You also get two, yes two, instructors! Working together, they discuss every step of the process and dig deep into why production artists make certain decisions. These valuable insights will be extremely useful for future projects you undertake.

The course covers blocking out, sculpting, brushes, automatic retopology, textures, painting, lighting and all the steps in between. You’ll learn to rig and pose your dragon to create an impressive final render. And, you’ll create a high poly model to make a great looking game-ready asset.

The course is for people with a basic familiarity with Blender, so if you’re a beginner take one of the other Blender courses in the bundle first.

blendergreasepencilcourse.description_text:
Want to animate in 2D without leaving your 3D workspace?

This course unlocks the power of Blender’s Grease Pencil tool - perfect for creating hand-drawn animations, storyboards, FX and more right inside Blender.

You’ll learn how to draw, animate,and rig 2D characters, use layers and keyframes like a pro, and blend 2D with 3D for unique visual styles.

Whether you're into stylised cutscenes, comic art or full-on 2D animation, this course gives you the tools and skills to bring your ideas to life.

No prior animation experience needed - just pick up your (digital) pencil and go!

blenderlandscapescourse.description_text:
Want to create stunning landscapes in Blender that look amazing and actually work for your projects?

This course shows you how to design, sculpt, and texture detailed environments using pro tools like geometry nodes, vertex painting, and weight painting.

You’ll start from 2D map sketches, block out your terrain, then use procedural systems and hand-crafted control to place vegetation, paint materials, and bring your scene to life.

Perfect for game devs, cinematic artists, or anyone who loves world-building.

Build beautiful, controllable landscapes - no randomness, just results.

blendercharactercreatorforvideogamescour.human_name: Blender Character Creator for Video Games Course
blendercharactercreatorforvideogamescour.description_text:
Ready to build jaw-dropping characters in Blender?

This course takes you from total beginner to character artist, guiding you through modelling, sculpting, retopology, texturing and rigging - all in Blender 4.2.

You’ll create game-ready mechs and orcs with armour, clothing and all the detail your projects deserve.

Learn to sculpt muscles, bake textures and rig for posing and animation.

Whether you’re aiming for games, films, or portfolio glory, this course gives you the tools to make characters that truly stand out.

No experience needed - just grab this bundle and bring your creativity.

blendermaterialnodesmasterycoursecreates.description_text:
Learn how to create any material from scratch using nodes in Blender!

This course is for you if you want to…

+ Create realistic shaders without relying on images.

+ Increase your knowledge of dozens of utility nodes for math, vector math, and colour & value manipulation.

+ Take your procedural texturing skills to the next level.

+ Create your own customisable procedural materials & textures for any Blender project.

You’ll create many different textures, from beginner to advanced level (including mud shader, wood shader and brick shader). Along the way you’ll learn a lot of advanced techniques that you can then use to make any materials you can think of.

All the while we’ll be showing you how to make your workflow more efficient and much faster.

Create spectacular textures and become a Blender Material Nodes Master today.

onetreeplanted.description_text:
Donations to support One Tree Planted are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
We are a non-profit focused on global reforestation. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

fromblendertogodotcourse.description_text:
Want to bring your Blender models into Godot without the export chaos?

This course shows you a fast, clean pipeline for getting static assets, props, and fully rigged characters from Blender into Godot - no fluff, just what works.

You’ll bake textures, build LODs, and rig + animate characters with confidence, then export them using formats that actually behave inside the engine.

Whether you’re working on environments or animated heroes, you’ll get your assets game-ready with less trial and error.

Perfect for devs and artists building their Blender-to-Godot workflow.

fromblendertounrealcourse.description_text:
Want to bring your Blender creations into Unreal without the export headaches?

This course gives you a clean, reliable workflow for getting static models, rigged characters, and animations into Unreal Engine - fast.

You’ll bake textures, build LODs, rig characters with Rigify, and animate using Blender’s Non-Linear Animation Editor.

Then export individual actions that drop straight into Unreal, ready to go. Perfect for artists and devs who want to ditch pre-made assets and build a pro-quality pipeline.

No fluff, no broken rigs - just game-ready results.

fromblendertounitycourse.description_text:
Got cool models in Blender but Unity keeps throwing a wobbly when you import them?

This course teaches the exact workflow to get your assets from Blender into Unity, clean, crisp and game-ready.

You’ll bake textures, rig characters with Rigify and export animations that actually work in-engine.

Learn to set up LODs, build control rigs and pick the right file formats so nothing breaks on import.

Perfect for artists and devs who want to stop relying on pre-made stuff and start building their own pipeline.

Pick up the bundle now and finally make Unity play nice with your Blender creations.

blendersimulationnodescoursenew.description_text:
Unlock the secrets of Blender 4.2 Simulation Nodes and take your animation skills to the next level!

Whether you’re crafting jaw-dropping particle effects or building complex simulations, this course is your ultimate power-up.

Learn how to create gravity systems, simulate realistic boid behaviours, and master particle FX that make your animations pop.

You’ll gain pro-level control with intuitive node workflows and non-destructive techniques that update in real-time.

Perfect for Blender users ready to level up and make their creations truly epic.

Don’t just animate—simulate! Dive in now and become a Blender simulation wizard today!

blenderalphabrushpack_rockstone.human_name: Blender Alpha Brush Pack: Rock and Stone
blenderalphabrushpack_rockstone.description_text:
Transform Your 3D Sculpts with the Ultimate Rock and Stone Blender Alpha Brush Pack.

Are you a digital sculptor on the quest to create the most rugged mountains, age-old stone formations, or realistic rocky terrains?

Our Rock and Stone brush collection is your secret weapon to achieve that level of detail that makes viewers want to reach out and touch the stone.

Unearth the solid features packed in this kit, 113 Alpha Brushes including General Brushes, Rock Brushes and Stone Ground Brushes. Plus you get 113 Alpha Textures and a Fully-Equipped .Blend File:

Whether you're etching out the crags of a cliff face or shaping the grooves in ancient rune stones, this pack is engineered to add a layer of authenticity to your work that standard modeling can't match.

createanimecharactersinblendercourse.human_name: Create Anime Characters In Blender Course
createanimecharactersinblendercourse.description_text:
Learn to model, rig and animate an anime character in Blender.

And at the same time, discover the more complex aspects of 3D modelling such as topology and edge flow.

In this course, you’ll learn how to model anime characters and develop skills in box modelling techniques.

You’ll make clothing for your characters, and learn basic to intermediate techniques which include rigging the clothing and texturing. These simple, yet effective, techniques will prepare you for more advanced modelling and topology

This course is aimed at intermediate Blender users looking for more advanced techniques and a “stepping stone” course to make the jump from beginner to pro!

You’ll need a reasonable understanding of the blender interface, ideally having gone through one of our other beginner friendly Blender courses in this bundle.

Grab the bundle to level up in Blender and create your own anime characters now!

completeblendercreatorcourse.description_text:
Want to learn 3D art? From modelling to animation and lots in between, this is the course for you!

With over 30,000 5 star reviews, it's already one of the most popular Blender courses on the internet. And we've just gone and made it even better!

You’ll learn how to create 3D Models and Assets for games using Blender, the free-to-use 3D production suite. We start super simple so you'll be ok with little or no experience.

If you're a complete beginner, we'll teach you all the modelling fundamentals you'll need. If you're an artist, we'll teach you to bring your assets to life. If you're a coder, we'll teach you modelling and design principles.

Dive in now, you won't be disappointed!

blendersculptingbrushescourse.description_text:
Unleash your sculpting superpowers and create stunning hyper detailed masterpieces in Blender 4!

Discover the secrets of mastering sculpting using sculpting brushes, and transform your digital creations into awe inspiring works of art.

With the power of alpha and VDM brushes you’ll add intricate details quickly, breathing life into your characters like never before.

In this comprehensive (yet concise) course, Grant will guide you through the entire sculpting workflow. Equipping you with the skills and knowledge to harness the full potential of these incredible brushes.

But that’s not all!!

To fuel your creative fire you’ll receive a pack of free brushes to expand your artistic arsenal.

This course is in early access release, with new content being regularly added.

So if you’re ready to elevate your sculpting skills to the next level, grab the bundle and join us on this transformative journey to unleash the sculpting genius within you!

blenderalphabrushpack_skinscales.human_name: Blender Alpha Brush Pack: Skin & Scales
blenderalphabrushpack_skinscales.description_text:
Unleash the Monster Within Your Models with the Ultimate Skin & Scales Blender Alpha Brush Pack!

Ready to infuse your digital creatures with realism that breathes life (and a little bit of fear) into your scenes?

Elevate your sculpting game with our meticulously crafted Blender Monster Skin & Scales Alpha Brush Pack.

Lurking inside this monstrous kit are 70 Alpha Brushes, including Monster Skin Brushes, Organic Brushes, Scale Brushes and Vein Brushes. Plus Alpha Textures and a handy .Blend File.

Whether you're a seasoned pro looking to speed up your workflow or a beginner eager to jumpstart your sculpting journey, this pack is designed to help you carve out high-quality, believable details effortlessly.

blenderskillbuilder_modellingchallenges.description_text:
Want to sharpen your Blender modelling skills without committing to a full project?

This course gives you a series of fun, bite-sized challenges designed to push your creativity and boost your confidence.

You’ll tackle objects of increasing complexity, each one focused on different modelling techniques and problem-solving skills.

Perfect if you’ve done a beginner course and want to level up through practice. No filler, no fluff - just hands-on Blender modelling that helps you get better, faster.

Grab the bundle and watch your confidence grow.

blendertexturepaintingcourse.description_text:
Want to create stylised models in Blender that you can place in your games?

Learn modelling techniques for hand painted objects, giving them a fun, quirky, stylised look.

Learn how to unwrap and set up for texture painting. Find out how to quickly and easily create different textures for some of the most popular, such as wood, rock, grass, stone and metals.

The course is created at a ""real time"" pace, allowing you to follow along and create your models at the same time as the instructors without needing to stop and start the video. Nothing is skipped or speeded up, so you get to see the entire workflow.

A basic knowledge of blender interface would be helpful. If you’re a game asset artist, or an artist wanting to make use of your skills to create 3D assets, this course is perfect for you!

Become a Blender pro by mastering the super impressive technique of texture painting!

blenderanimationandriggingcourse.description_text:
Want to create amazing animations, just like you see on your favourite game characters?

In this course, you’ll bring your creations to life and learn how to rig and animate models and characters.

While the course is mainly character focused, the principles and tools you learn can be applied to animate anything in Blender.

By the end of the course you’ll be able to rig and animate characters ready for game engines, or anything else you want to use them for!

The course is Blender 4 compatible, and will be updated if there are any changes to the way things work in Blender 4.1.

So what are you waiting for? Dive in now and start animating!

onetreeplanted.description_text:
Donations to support One Tree Planted are made to  PayPal Giving Fund, subject to its policies.
 
We are a non-profit focused on global reforestation. Every dollar donated plants one tree.

from_bundle.tile_short_name: Learn To Create Game Art in Blender 2025
from_bundle.marketing_blurb: Get Isometric Scene Course, Blender Grease Pencil Course, From Blender to Godot Course, and more!
from_bundle.detailed_marketing_blurb: Start your next career as a game art designer with a little help from the Learn to Create Game Art in Blender 2025 Bundle! Learn the basics or polish your existing skill set with expert-led courses like The Blender Sculpting Brushes Course, The Complete Blender Creator Course, and The Blender Animation & Rigging Course. Discover how to export your work directly from Blender to Unity and Godot with ease! Save big on life-changing creative tools and help support One Tree Planted with your purchase.
from_bundle.author: GameDev.TV

basic_data.human_name: Humble Book Bundle: Japanese Language, Culture, and Travel by Stone Bridge Press Encore
basic_data.detailed_marketing_blurb: Prepping for a trip to Japan? Or are you simply interested in learning the ins and outs of this beautiful country? This bundle of books will help you brush up on your language skills, appreciate Japan’s culture, and plan an itinerary for your future journeys. Kanji Pict-o-Graphix will help you wrap your head around the hardest parts of the Japanese written language with helpful mnenomic techniques. Full of useful guides and photos, Tokyo Stroll: A Guide to City Sidetracks and Easy Explorations encourages unstructured exploration of this exciting city. Just Enough provides valuable insights on living fully and sustainably, inspired by lessons learned in Japan’s past. Pay what you want for all these books and more and help support the Book Industry Charitable Foundation.
